text: Tie I received is slightly darker than the one shown. Looks really nice so I'm keeping it.
Ordering ties can be a pain especially online since the color of the tie shown is often different from the one you get.The tie I received was very close to true to color and shade.  Looks nice.

Ordering ties can be a pain especially online since the color of the tie shown is often different from the one you get.  Probably due to the bright flash sometimes used when taking the picture.The tie I received was very close to true to color and shade. Pictured one is slightly darker. Looks nice.
The tie came in the correct color and shade. Nice that it can be washed too.

I bought this set of bulbs to use above my kitchen table. They throw off a nice color, close to incandescent, but they have a serious drawback.If the bulb is inserted in a light fixture with the orientation as shown in the picture (threads down, lens up) then the bulbs do not produce a very strong light below the light fixture.  I pulled out my light meter and metered the illumination above, to the side, and below the bulbs to prove what I was seeing with my eyes.  Most of the light, by design, goes out the side and some up due to the lens, but little light goes downward.  This is most likely due to the fact that the lighting LEDS are blocked from downward illumination due to the base blocking illumination in addition to the LEDS orientation.I ended up reinstalling some of the original incandescent bulbs, every other one, to allow me to get enought downward light to actually read something on the kitchen table. I had high hopes for these bulbs but the design needs to change somewhat to allow light projection below the lens assembly.  Some other manufactures that I've tried had the LEDS point at a 30 degree downward angle to compensate for this problem, too bad this company did not.The illumination looks nice, they dim down to about 15%, but I'm not impresses overall with using them as a total replacement for incandescent due to the base blocking downward illumination.The search continues.....
Facebook App does the job and keeps my wife and I up to date.

This is a nice 12v DC red LED strobe light.Most of the light is thrown out of the top of the lens as this is the direction that the LEDs face. You would still be able to see the illumination at night from the side if mounted on the overhand of your home but during the daytime it probably would not get your attention unless it could be mounted so the brightest portion of light (through top) would be facing you.The unit includes a base that can be attached to whatever flat surface you are using and then the light assembly attaches to the base.Since this is a LED fixture the predicted life span should be a very long time.DIMENSIONS:2 and 1/2 inch diameter1 and 5/8 inch heightPROS:- Very bright and intense light throw directly through the top of the lens (even visible during daylight)- LEDs are long lasting so it should last for many years.- No moving partsCONS:- Poor light illumination through the sides of the lens (some of the LEDs should have been directed at the side of the lens to increase viewing angle) for daytime viewing- No rubber seal for direct exposure to water

This is a nice 12v DC blue LED strobe light.Most of the light is thrown out of the top of the lens as this is the direction that the LEDs face. You would still be able to see the illumination at night from the side if mounted on the overhand of your home but during the daytime it probably would not get your attention unless it could be mounted so the brightest portion of light (through top) would be facing you.The unit includes a base that can be attached to whatever flat surface you are using and then the light assembly attaches to the base.Since this is a LED fixture the predicted life span should be a very long time.DIMENSIONS:2 and 1/2 inch diameter1 and 5/8 inch heightPROS:- Very bright and intense light throw directly through the top of the lens (even visible during daylight)- LEDs are long lasting so it should last for many years.- No moving partsCONS:- Poor light illumination through the sides of the lens (some of the LEDs should have been directed at the side of the lens to increase viewing angle) for daytime viewing- No rubber seal for direct exposure to water

NOTE: This Model is for the INDOOR ONLY USE (dry environment)--- If you need outdoor look at the other model.I've been looking for ways to cut my electric usage as my electric utility tell me that I use more electricity than my neighbors. Using LED bulbs is cutting my usage as well as my electric bill.I first tried the 2700K version of these bulbs but found them to be way too dim compared to the 75 watt bulbs they were replacing. So in order to get a better range of illumination I upped the color to the next step being the 4000K bulbs.The 4000K bulbs really made a big difference compared to the 2700K bulbs in the range of light of illumination. The 4000K color though does cast instead of a yellow color, like standard incandescent light bulbs, a white light closer to the florescent light that you get from an office light fixture. Illuminates well but takes a bit of getting use to.I like the lights but wished that instead of 4000K they were a bit yellower like say 3500K instead. I guess I'm just use to the yellow light from years of experience with them. The bulbs also look funny when they are not working. Looks like yellow segments under the lens, but when they illuminate the light output is white.I wish the price would come down. I paid about $41 each for these lights and now I just need to make sure I get my money's worth. Now though, when a cat walks through my yard every night I won't complain as much about the energy usage.PROS:- Very bright in the 4000K version, 2700K version was rather dim compared to a 75w incandescent- Good illumination- Saves on the electric bill- This version of bulb is for INDOOR use (has vent holes around base and on side of unit where water would enter if used outside)CONS:- Light output is more like a florescent light color in an office- Price per bulb is high- Not attractive looking for a home or environments were autistics would be a concern

I've been looking for ways to cut my electric usage as my electric utility tell me that I use more electricity than my neighbors.  Using LED bulbs is cutting my usage as well as my electric bill.I use these lights in my outdoor motion lights.  I first tried the 2700K version of these bulbs but found them to be way too dim compared to the 75 watt bulbs they were replacing.  So in order to get a better range of illumination I upped the color to the next step being the 4000K bulbs.The 4000K bulbs really made a big difference compared to the 2700K bulbs in the range of light of illumination.  Now my entire back yard as well as my neighbors and the trees are fully illuminated.  The 4000K color though does cast instead of a yellow color, like standard incandescent light bulbs, a white light closer to the florescent light that you get from an office light fixture.  Illuminates well but takes a bit of getting use to.Funny thing is that my solar light fixture in the back yard always turned off when the incandescent light turned on but with these new bulbs installed the fixtures are not responding to the light being shined on them so they stay on too.  Interesting how 2700K light frequency vs 4000K is not noticed by solar devices.I like the lights but wished that instead of 4000K they were a bit yellower like say 3500K instead.  I guess I'm just use to the yellow light from years of experience with them.  The bulbs also look funny when they are not working in the daylight.  Looks like yellow segments under the lens, but when they illuminate the light output is white.I wish the price would come down. I paid about $41 each for these lights and now I just need to make sure I get my money's worth. Now though, when a cat walks through my yard every night I won't complain as much about the energy usage.PROS:- Very bright in the 4000K version, 2700K version was rather dim compared to a 75w incandescent- Good illumination- Saves on the electric bill- This version of bulb is for outdoor use (no vent holes around base and on side of unit for water to gain entry)CONS:- Light output is more like a florescent light color in an office- Price per bulb is high*****Update 11/21/2014******I still really like these lights.  I just bought 2 more for another flood light fixture that I have for the front yard.  Last summer when we had a power failure and I had a standby generator running I had the backyard set installed and they even worked with the low voltage brownout we were having at 80v instead of the normal 110v.  I'm really liking the LED lights as my cfl bulbs wouldn't turn on with the lower voltage but these guys worked great.

When I worked for an alarm company we use to try all kinds of brands of batteries.  Many brands were garbage and as a serviceman I was able to tell how cheap it was by the lead weight in them.Commercial accounts, under maintenance agreements, always got the best equipment.  If we had to go back yearly we were wasting money on replacement equipment and in paying employees wages for free service calls.  Yuasa was our number 1 brand.  It tends to cost more than the other brands but the life expectancy was the longest.  Residential customers got whatever was the flavor of the month per the company.  They paid us for the service call and for the battery on a 100-150% markup.  Most generic batteries would last 1-3 years whereas some of our Yuasa's were going strong at 5 years.As with most alarm batteries, if your power is out for an extended period of time, be sure to unplug the battery before it dies completely.  If you drain it dead it won't recover - the cells will be permanently damaged.  Leave the alarm box wide open so you remember to plug the battery back in when the power returns though.PROS:- longevity if not cooked by charging circuit- quality lead acid- not likely to leak or swell up unless cooked by charging circuitCONS:- tend to cost more than other brands

I have a ton of home automation stuff throughout my house.  Kinda like a hobby seeing what I can do next.  I bought this unit to replace an older unit that died on me around Christmas.  It was imperative to get my system back under control from a hand-held perspective.  My computer does most of the work but we manually use a wireless controller to turn on Christmas lights in the bushes or the tree if we want them on before the scheduled time.  Gott keep the wifie happy.  When the old unit died, after 10 years or so, we knew we had to get another.  X10 is an older technology which has been replaced by z-wave and others.  Problem is that the new technology costs a lot more than the older X10.  In time I may switch but for now since everything is working fine I'm satisfied with X10 running landscape lights, decorations, tree lights, garage door alert, dryer alert, etc.PROS:- work well with handheld remote- allows wireless devices to interface with hardwiredCONS:- nothing lasts forever

After doing a lot of research and looking at the construction of the various speakers, as well as my size requirements, I decided this was the speaker to get for my center channel.  We all know that the center channel is the most important speaker since it will basically provide us with the voices in movies and direct-on sound effects.  You don't want to go cheap on the center speaker.I've been using this speaker now for months and love it, love it, love it.  The sound it produces is true and clean.  Since my 55" TV is on a stand, instead of being mounted on the wall, I tried to put the speaker in front of the TV but autistics and the fact that the top edge of the speaker blocked some of my view of the bottom edge of the TV, I instead placed the speaker right behind  the TV.  The speaker is in the darkness behind the TV yet it sits on the stand centered behind the TV unblocked due to the design of the TV.  The sound is astounding from this speaker.  I'm thinking about buying another one to replace the one I have upstairs.PROS:- attractive design- perfect size not too big and not too small- awesome sound and clarity at high volume or low volume- no complaints from the wifeCONS:- none to date, I'll edit this review if I have any

This was the perfect size cable for the short distance I had to run in the entertainment center from receiver to CD carousel.  The short size helped get rid of he rolling up of cable in the cabinet.PROS:- short size was perfect for my installation- cable is heavy duty - a feel of quality- ends of cable actually snap into place on the devices assuring a secure connection- audio sound is crisp and clearCONS:- none

I'm a side sleeper and I was in need of a firm pillow.  Another problem I have is that I roll from my left side, to my right, and then back to my left throughout the night.  This so far is one of the better pillows I have found so far.  While I haven't found any pillows like the firm ones they use to sell in the late 80s and early 90s, this has been one of my better bets.  I still need to flip it nightly as my head crushes it down throughout the night but this seems to do the trick.I currently sleep with 2 pillows under my head.  A thin one on bottom and this one on top of the thin one.  I tried using 2 of these but then my head was bent up in the air too much and it gave me a stiff neck.  Save one of your worn thin pillows to put under this one and this should do the trick.PROS:- one of the firmest pillows I've been able to find for a side sleeper- flipping the pillow nightly does the trick- has retained its shape, have had now for a few monthsCONS:- using 2 of these pillows under your head will surely give you a stiff neck- 1 pillow was not high enough, I had to use a thin pillow under this one to get the right height.

I needed to space a piece of equipment off of the floor to allow some ventilation under it.  These feet were the perfect fit.  They have adhesive on the top contact side and taper ever so slightly to the bottom.PROS:- strong self adhesive on top surface- allows for spacing to get equipment off of carpet- solid construction which allow them to hold up a 15 pound device without crushingCONS:- none

This unit has an analog needle that responds to electronic noise fields.  You can get the same results with an old AM radio except you won't see a needed move or a blinking red light turn on to tell you there is electrical noise in the area.I tried using this unit to see if I could hear the transmission from my new Smart Electric Meter which the power company installed when I wasn't home.  To my disappointment the only thing this was able to pick up was the noise from the electricity which could be heard anywhere along any power wire that has a device drawing power on it.  If you are looking for something high-tech, this is not the device. Save you money.  The ones you are looking for cost $200 and up.PROS:- small- not expensive- has blinking red light that will illuminate when you are picking up  electrical noise along a wire with a load on it- has a speaker that provides a buzz to let you know you are by an active AC current draw- has a high and low setting (probably a resister inside)CONS:- meter is analog, no digital display.  Reminds me of a kid's toy from the 70s- only hears the noise along an electric line with a draw on it- can get the same results, minus the red light blink and needle movement, by holding an AM radio in your hand and moving it along an electrical line under load- not worth sending back

I bought this because a friend of mine told me I needed to watch it.  After suffering thorough it I decided that it basically just tells you to watch what is going on in politics and to not sit back but to get involved and vote for what you see as being right.  Our vote is basically all we have until we loose that right too.

When I saw these straws I though I found the perfect match.  They were advertised as 9" x 1/2" which was going to be an inexpensive alternative to the 1/2" plastic sleeves I needed for my mechanical pencil vending machine.  If they were actually 1/2" I could slide the mechanical pencil into the tube and it would then be able to roll out of the vending machine.  However when they arrived I found them to be about a 1/16" shy of 1/2" which meant the mechanical pencils would not fit.I know I didn't buy the straws for the intended purpose, but I was counting on the vender actually making them to the size specs mentioned which would have saved me dough on buying tubes from another source.  Now I've given them to the wife for her to use for crafts or in the kitchen.PROS:- would make a good straw for shakes or smoothies- plastic is heavy and should not collapse when you such up your drinkCONS:- the dimensions are not true to what was described.  I now see that they are not claiming to be exact but approximate.- returning them would cost as much as they are worth.

Had to get an extension cable for my document camera at work.  After reading several reviews and looking over the quality specs I decided this was the cable to get.  When I first connected it up to the document camera and the projector I was impressed by the return of the color red again in my visuals.  I though it was a projector problem at first but now I know it was just an older cable that had developed a problem.PROS:- 24 feet of cable was perfect for my job- ends are secure- cable has the look and feel of quality- secure fit when plugged into devices, not sloppy or looseCONS:- none, I love the cable

Just perfect for the upper bunk of a bunk bed. It came in a box that was light and easy to carry inside. All it took was one swipe to open the box and the mattress literally sprung out. I was worried it would have the bend in it after being rolled up like that, but I haven't noticed any damage to the mattress at all. It's very comfortable to sleep on, too, which is nice for guests that stay over. Sleeping on it continuously might not be as pleasant, but for now I'm really happy with the mattress.

I have been purchasing Otterbox for all my phones since back in the day. I have come to really respect the name and trust the product. I have not been disappointed to date. The defender case is my favorite but has gotten bulky on me lately so I decided to try a slimmer version. The commuter case is just the thing for my needs. Not only is the two tone purple very stylish, it is very well made, too. I love the slim fit in my hand and can easily slide it into/out of my front or back pocket if/when needed. Dropping it, I haven't noticed any nicks, cuts, dents, etc. and my iPhone is completely sound. The only thing that worries me is not having screen protection that I can see like on the defender case. However, I can clearly see a nice lip all the way around my phone to protect the screen from a fall. I will keep this updated to see how the commuter case works for me.

While the Celtic design is indeed beautiful, this particular necklace looks like someone took a button and attached it to a dainty but cheap looking chain. I had expected a much more gorgeous necklace from the picture alone and was disappointed with what I received. So if you are judging solely by the picture, you will be disappointed. However, upon closer inspection you will notice that the metal is solid and the chain sturdy. When worn, it changes a little (depending on what color you contrast it with) and looks prettier. It's a pretty piece but not a gorgeous chain and pendant. I wouldn't purchase it myself - thus the three stars - but someone else might find the quality and look worth it. If I could, I would give it 3 1/2 stars.

Very dainty and beautifully wrapped ring. The silver is solid and looks authentic more so than plated. I was impressed with the look of the CZ. To me, it looked more like sapphires and diamonds than black and white CZ. It's a perfect fit for ring size as well so feel confident ordering your size.

Step 1. Assemble all parts after child tears into box.Step 2. Explain the rules to the kiddos as you take a few swings yourself and have a little fun.Step 3. Let your nieces/nephews (or whomever you have purchased for) have at it or be the 2nd or 3rd player. Maximum of 3 players. Minimum of 2.Step 4. Laugh yourself silly as you watch their antics and attempts to win the game.For $19.99 it's totally worth the fun and antics. The object of the game is to knock the Stormtrooper discs off their "stations" with the Millennium Falcon while at the same time protecting your Stormtroopers from the other players by flipping and blocking the Falcon as it flies past - and yes, Chewbacca is at the top as displayed in the picture. Remember, though, that this is a board game for the kiddos so don't expect too much detail and quality of product or you'll be disappointed. Cardboard and plastic are the construction pieces of this game.

I generally use much higher thread count sheets, but this one is perfect for anyone. The lower thread count should mean poorer quality, but that's not the case. I'm very impressed with the lightness and feel of the sheets. They aren't as soft as some of mine, but goodness for 200 count they are SOFT. They are also very well made. You can see the weave is a little different from normal sheets making it softer and a little more strong, I believe. If they were priced between $20-$40 for the set, I'd say you were getting a great deal.

Having recently lost two friends to cancer, and two others fighting hard, I had to have this bracelet. I'm so happy to have selected it. It is absolutely gorgeous. It was a slight tight but has a tiny little hinge in the back that you can almost see in the picture. This allows you to "open" the bracelet enough to fit over your hand and slide onto your wrist. It's an infinitesimal amount of movement, though, before it feels like you'll break it if you try any further. It doesn't open enough to slide directly onto my wrist, if that helps at all. Smaller persons would have a much easier time sliding the bracelet on and off than I did.There aren't too many crystals on it, just on one side of the ribbon, but it's enough to make the bracelet look stylish. Actually, with more, I think you'd lose the true nature of the design. It looks like someone tied a ribbon to a flowing piece of material that starts with Hope and ends with peace/healing in whatever form. Priced currently at $30.73 with free Prime shipping, I'd say it's a perfect gift for those with family members or friends fighting -- or the fighters themselves. It's enough that I'll be purchasing four more for my friends. This one I'll keep and wear with hope.

It may be that I'm just not familiar enough with it or that it's too new. I've used these personal training for boxing, mixed martial arts and cross fit. They give a great work out so when I saw this particular one I got really excited. However, the ones at the gym are more pliable, durable and less solid. Granted they are older so it might just be that this has to be used a whole lot more to get comfortable with, but as it stands now, I can't get a good hit in without messing up somehow. Messing up could mean injury, though I've not injured myself yet. I'm reserving full review until I've used the kick shield much longer and have allowed others to use it.

Somehow these are so much better than free weights. I use them with my personal trainer and love them. It gives you the right amount of resistance (depending on which band you use) and will have you sweating off the pounds in no time. My PT stated that they are high quality bands that will last a long while. Having them in their own carry bag allows me to toss them and take them on the go - working out any time/ any place. Definitely a great investment. And since they go with the amount of strength you have, there are no cumbersome and dangerous dead weights to worry about the kids getting into. Granted, these are not toys, but dropping one on your foot will not cause great pains. Linking the bands to the handles is a breeze. All in all a great product that I'm very pleased with.

WHOLLY MOLEY! This baby can shred like nothing else. I had no issues with paper jams, gummed up cutters or anything else. Having the basket pull out is awesome, too, because you don't have to deal with leavings fluttering around you as you lift the top. You will get some dust and leavings when you remove the basket but a little swipe can wipe it all up. It can take stapled pages, too. The only thing I noticed is 18 pages is pushing it to work harder so I cut it down to no more than 10 at a time. It seemed to handle that really well and continued consistently without shutting off from overheating. I had a lot to shred and was impressed that I didn't have to take any breaks. I would highly recommend this for heavy personal office use. I'm glad I came across it. I'd also recommend it for small libraries and businesses.

First, the wrapping - this absolutely gorgeous watch comes carefully packaged in its own gift box. Made of leather and absolutely gorgeous it is definitely a piece to keep the watch in when not in use. The watch itself is exquisite in design and comes already set to the right time ... for anyone. It is 100 meters water resistant (not water proof) and can handle some roughness. It is a larger watch than the picture leads you to believe, but not so large that it didn't look great on both my teen or my husband. I'm still learning everything this watch can do and am always surprised. Put this one down on your gift list for any tech minded sportster and you'll have a happy gift recipient.

Growing up with my brothers' having these was fun for me, too. The small micromachines were just the right size to fit into their pockets and trade with friends. Nothing has changed in years. The sets are still solidly made, very detailed and absolutely fun to play with. This particular set doesn't come with everything shown on the box. Please note the back of the box for what figurines and pieces actually come in the set.

If you have not gotten into The Iron Fey series, now is the time to do it. Start with the first book and you won't be able to put the entire series down. Because this is a later book, I don't want to give anything away because it will ruin the first set of books. So stop what you are doing, look up The Iron King and get lost in the world of fairies, humans, kings, queens and mysteries as Megan Chase does her best to find her brother Ethan who has been replaced with a changeling. Watch as she falls in love then has to make some of the hardest decisions in her life throughout the books. Then learn more about Ethan and who he is while you anxiously delve deeper into the world of fairies and humans. If you have a teen who is into fantasy, buy the whole set for Christmas. Julie Kagawa is one of my favorite authors and never fails to give a great read. I still want more of the Fey. I don't think I'll ever get enough of it.

1. Most important - Installation. Very easy to install compared to others we've tried.2. Easy to program and equally easy to use. With great speakers, you'll be fully satisfied.3. Fits into just about any year, make, model from US to imported. This particular one went into a very old vehicle.4. HELLO! BLUETOOTH!!! Stream away and rock to your most favorite songs or listen to the very easy to set and tune radio.Price - not bad for what this little guy can do. Currently just under $60 with prime shipping. That's a really good deal in my book. I'd put this on the Christmas list for a teen. Give them the experience of installing their own system without breaking the bank. AND because this is so inexpensive, you can install some high quality sound system (speakers, etc.) to go with it.

No more buying bottled water for my coffee maker or any other of my special appliances. Fresh clean water I already pay for is readily available at the tap with this cool brita. The only downfall I found was the LENGTHY time it takes for the water to pass through the filter and the lid doesn't like to stay on tightly. Thus the four stars. Follow the directions, if you wish, but I used mine on the first go around with no carbon leftovers, etc. I did, however, flush the cartridge and wash the pitcher before use.
When has Epson ever gone wrong? Fabulous machine with excellent color and amazing capabilities. A must have!
Beautiful, useful and a fun design. Perfect for a new bride or as a gift for a friend or family member. Very comfortable to wear, too!
You may not always need one, but when you are in a bind they are the best tool around. Did not affect my RA at all. I say that's a major bonus
While the train is absolutely adorable and has 5 compartments to blow up, it is seriously lacking in balls. 50 doesn't even cover 1/4 of the area.

Very nicely padded and designed to keep your electronics safe. It's also unassuming so someone up to no good will pass you up without thinking twice - unless they know what's in the bag. It rests easy on the shoulders and gives you just the right amount of space to keep the necessities together.

I was pleased as punch when 6 hours after pouring my hot cup of coffee it was still really warm. I have a love/hate relationship with the design. I love that it's spill proof. Makes it great for when you have to stop suddenly and it goes tumbling down. However, I also do not like how difficult it is to open it without looking at it while driving. So if you drive a lot and want to take this along with you, it definitely will take some getting use to. One big bonus is ... wait for it ... DISHWASHER SAFE!!!! I love that.

Not impressed. This bag is thinner than the regular bags and caused me to go through several just trying to take out the trash. I'd recommend against it considering it was very basic cardboard that ripped a hole through it. Recycled or not, I'd like my trash bags to work well.

1. Cleans itself2. Fancy charging system3. Different levels of closeness to get that perfect shave.4. Attachments to make shaving a breeze.Why not five stars? Unfortunately, a charge doesn't last very long. Trimming, shaving, etc. runs the battery down pretty quickly. Make sure you have a back up just in case.

While being just a bit large, it is also really helpful to have the pages clearly legible and plenty of room to add what is necessary. Great for the office or the school. Definitely a good college gift for the busy student who needs organization in their life.

Absolutely adorable learning game for kids of all learning stages. Board games are a great interactive way for families to bond. This is no exception. Definitely a "put it on the Christmas list" gift to guarantee fun and bonding between families.

First, this stuff is beyond cheap. I didn't want it, tried to cancel when I caught the order I never made, but the seller demanded I pay return shipping (which ended up being too much so I became stuck with it). Seller was not polite at all. Basically said, "sorry, your problem, you pay return shipping."  I decided to lay it outside and test it out to write a review on it. First, the price is ridiculously high. As soon as I started to open the package pieces of the product started falling off. Like a very literal mess all over the place. It looks like your fake grass is dying. It's very, very, very thin. Think ground cover with little bits of green plastic sticking out of it. Second, it didn't last through the day. Literally was showing signs of wear and tear just from laying out. Third, it has an awful smell to it. You definitely can tell it's just as fake as it looks. It's going to the trash and instead of losing 3/4 of my money, I just lost it all. Expensive lesson learned by me that you'll hopefully not make. Don't trust this seller. Don't trust this product. Keep a close eye on your orders.
Aside from the Cinnamon, I absolutely found this to really relax you. The flavor is wonderful with just the right amount of spices to give it an uplifting boost.

Works just as well as the old school ones. It clamps down onto any surface with ease. I love how neatly pencils get sharpened without having to constantly pull it out, look at it and try again until you are almost down to a stub with electric ones.
Well made and beautiful. I was really impressed considering the price wasn't high at all.

Psychological thriller that will keep you guessing until the very end. I absolutely was creeped out by the story, but that's why I genuinely liked it. It grabbed me, freaked me out and held me to the very last page. I love the first person aspect and the twists and turns as you walk through the maze of the journal. I'm not sure that I agree that this is for younger ages, but it certainly is a book that reluctant teen readers would  love.

Even for $7.99 this is nothing more than an overrated blow dryer. I can air dry my nails much faster with my own breath. Waste of money and big mistake. I have very small hands and they absolutely did not fit well enough to do more than two fingers at a time. Take a good look at the picture. By the time you are done drying your nail polish on one hand, the other will be dry already.

Extremely inexpensive, very comfortable and durable. It worked well as an extra bed at the hotel. It was easy to inflate and deflate - both being very quick. Switch the dial to the middle and air stays out/in. Easy to use and absolutely wonderful. Glad I invested the money into this perfect bed.

I am still on the fence for this toy,. Yes, My Little Pony is quite popular but nothing about the toy really stands out to me as something different or unique than what is already on the market except the brand. It didn't catch the interest of my young ones like another brand did. I didn't quite like the feel of it either. However, that's more personal preference. I'm assuming if your child loves My Little Pony, they'll love this toy, but other than that, I would not purchase it.

Beautiful and well made. This darling apron gives great coverage. Granted it is 100% cotton, so it will shrink on you but not by much. I happen to love the neutral colors that go with anything. All around a great gift to give or receive.

WHOLLY SMOKES this is one big calendar. Yes, it is erasable and changeable. Yes, it encompasses the entire year (2016), but my goodness is it ever the biggest calendar. It can go portrait or landscape on your wall but would be best for an office setting and definitely NOT a home. I'm sure my opinion would be different had I used it at work instead of for home. However, I have to grade and review honestly and this most honestly is way too large for home use.

Sharp, well-balanced, and easy to use. I was impressed with the quality and beauty of this knife. I would say this would be a beautiful piece to add to any kitchen. It matched my other brand quite well and worked just as well without being outrageously expensive.

VTech is AMAZING! I love this little guy. He's so stinking cute and has the sweetest voice to encourage little ones to give crawling a try, or to crawl around after him. He's also great for toddlers just learning to walk. His soothing voice and words will make any little one want to follow him around. Best of all, he's not annoying! He sings little songs and is all around the cutest toy for a baby shower, first Christmas, etc. Recommended age by manufacturer is 6 months - 36 months, but I think you could start much earlier than that and certainly older preschoolers would get a kick out of it, too.

HEAVY, collapsible and very sturdily made. I absolutely loved the bird feeder. It holds the sunflower seeds perfectly, is easy to clean and keeps squirrels from accessing the birdseed inside. The spinner is just gorgeous. On a windy day, you can just sit and stare at it - enjoying the pretty designs it seems to make as it moves. Definitely a must have for every nature lover. This is on my wishlist and just in time for fall and winter enjoyment.

Do you remember playing with these tracks as a child? I do. I used to race along with my brothers and mess with the track to make the cars go faster, etc. This track needs no improvement. Set up is a little complex but still not so hard that a child can't do it. I absolutely love it. It brought back so many memories of playing with my brothers. This has made my Christmas list for my nephews. When you find something you've loved in the past has been redone to go faster, work better, etc. you just can't resist buying it for your children or family. Looking forward to great family fun in the very near future.

Epson keeps on improving! I'm not sure if it's me or if it's sincerely correct to say this seems to use a lot less ink than my other two Epson printers do. I much prefer this model to my 840 which is a bit odd considering this one is an 830. Wireless printing has come a long way and I love that I can print from any device in the home so long as it has wireless capabilities. It's an easy set up into your home network, too. The ink is about the same as other epson ink. No improvement there on pricing. Still and all, this is an excellent little printer. I'll continue to monitor it. It could just be that my other Epsons are getting older and requiring more ink. One thing is most certain, don't waste your money on cheaper ink that is "Epson Compatible." They just don't last long.

Okay, so I'm not sure exactly where to begin. I am actually a little shocked this book made it out without an uproar. I personally did like it. It wasn't a favorite, but it was definitely well done. Imagine if society become a bunch of religious zealots and you were forced to pay a tithe. What if demons roamed the streets looking to take your soul and the only thing between you and them was the church and its band of exorcists? I found the story to be moving in more ways than one. However, I think many religious people will find extreme offense to this book. It makes  me a little nervous for the author because you can clearly read what religions she is attacking. And yes, it is attacking. Again, I liked the book, but I didn't love it. If you can read it for fiction and just take it as fiction, I'm sure you'll enjoy it, too.

I am a total addict. I will be buying this brand of Hefty from here on out. It smells so good. Yes, even after you throw away rotted potatoes and other nasties, this bag holds its very pleasant smell. And, as always, is very strong to keep odors and trash locked in.

If you remember New York Seltzers and liked them, you'll love this. It's very bitter at first but then has a sweet aftertaste with just the right amount of sweetness to not be overpowering. It is 100% fully clear and is flavorful. Only one in our family completed hated it. The rest of us enjoyed it for the most part.

1. SO COMFORTABLE!!!2. Looks beautiful.3. Very light but very warm.4. Filler gives you a little padding.5. Easy to roll and store.The only negative is the bag it comes in. Save yourself the trouble and just cut it open. I was stuffed in so tight the bag actually ripped in two before we could get the sleeping back out. It's nylon and first a run started then RIIIIIPPPPP! Oh well, it was cheap anyway.

5 Reasons for 5 stars:1. Super absorbent2. NOT NOTICEABLE! YES!3. Keeps you dry feeling and takes away the embarrassment of incontinence after surgery, etc.4. Easy to dispose/replace5. COMFORTABLE!! No sweaty ick feeling. No smell.

Oh my freaking goodness. I have never read a book more dark and twisted than this. To get inside a killer's mind and watch as victims are humiliated and mutilated is beyond comprehension. I felt sucker punched through much of the book and have to say this is NOT for the faint of heart. It is also not for those who have been victims of abuse as it would likely trigger memories. If you love psychological thrillers and Dexter is your pal, this book is for you. The killer is methodical in selection. Precise in execution. Devious in ensnaring victims all towards one goal in mind. Yes, you will know who is the real intended victim. Yes, you get into the victim's mind as well. Yes, you will stay up all night to finish the book and then wish you hadn't.

PHEW! Finally something that makes Stats more fun and interesting for teens. I happened to like stats in school and was disappointed when the concept and importance wasn't discovered by my students. Stats for Dummies is done exactly as the other "Dummies" collections are. Everything is explained in full detail. You receive the simplest of instructions that are easy to understand and help grades go up instead of down. This is a must need for every student who is struggling in their Stats class.
I expected a cheap product for such an inexpensive price. Instead, I received nicely made cables of top quality.

Very light and yet sturdy. I was quite surprised when they didn't snap like twigs when being put into the ground. They are a bit pricey for the feel and quality, but only just. Our graveyard tombstones will be a big hit this year with these attached to the backs. Word of warning, attach something to heavy and you'll need to secure it with rocks around or something heavy.

Sharp looking and sleek, this wonderful All-In-One security system is compatible with your iPhone. You are able to talk two way on it, which is really cool when someone comes to your door and you say, "YES, Can I help you", while they freak and look around. Picture quality in day and night is what I have come to expect from just about any security camera out there - Not the best, but better than nothing. Usage/Assembly is so easy a five year old can do it. Just unpack it, plug it in, download the app from the app store and viola! You are good to go. The only thing I haven't gotten an answer for is if it is hackable. Hopefully the fact that we have major protection means it's protected, too, but it does go on its own wifi/bluetooth connection. For that reason alone I'm lowering it to four stars.

As an American Indian mix, I tend to turn orange or yellow when attempting to use self tanners. My olive complexion literally brings on a sickly hue when I attempt to wear certain colors or darken my skin with self tanners. Not so with this tanner. I'm really happy with the results.

Absolutely imaginative and phenomenal for young readers (especially the reluctant ones). Fans of Percy Jackson, Fablehaven, Ink Heart, Ranger's Apprentice and numerous other favorites will find this a fantastic read. I'm an adult (granted librarian) and I found the book quite entertaining. It's hard to find really engaging series that pull young minds into the world of reading. When I come across a keeper, I'm happy and add it to my collection. Definitely something every teacher and librarian should have available on their shelves.

Perfect, reliable, great color, long lasting, money saver ... the list goes on and on about all the pluses. No more having to replace ink once a month (gets really expensive). Now I just sit back, relax and let the kids go wild printing out their homework assignments, paperwork, etc. This is THE printer for your home. Prices have come down on regular printers so much so that you just about can replace the printer for the price of ink. Just think of the money you'll save without having to replace that ink cartridge for up to 2 years. If you print as often as our family does, you'll be saving quite a bit of money. Truthfully, it's worth the investment.

WOW! This is the mother of all mothers. Definitely drop your Epson (or other printer) and pick this baby up. Yes, it's a little pricey but just add up the cost of ink and how quickly you run out and then imagine not running out for up to TWO YEARS!!! It's easy set up, easy use, and - if the price stays low - easy to replace the huge ink well. I'm seriously impressed. Every office should have this printer, hands down.

I'm totally loving the clear bags. I was worried they'd be weaker than the others - don't know why I was thinking that - but they proved to be just as fabulous as our regular Heftys. It helps to see if I'm taking out the trash or the recyclables without having to open up the bag and rummage around. Glad to have them and they are fully recyclable, too!
Beautiful with plenty of room to write for teens and college students. I'm adding this to my list of gifts to give our new exchange students every year.

First, as the seller clearly states, the dress in the picture is seen with a slip under it. The dress itself is one thin layer of material and two thin layers of tulle. It has giant, chunky, very clear beads that decorate the front. No color to them at all except for 4-5 reflective beads that give it a sort of shine you see in the picture. Unfortunately, the beaded top of the dress came entirely apart when the bride put the dress on. Yep, all beads fell off. They are sewn and linked with just one thread to the dress. Imagine hearing the clatter of beads scattering all over the floor. You get what you pay for. Sewing them back on wasn't an option as most of the beads were really, really sharp. It's just a loss. Thankfully it was an inexpensive purchase.

1. Convenient 2 cup serving boxes. (still need a bowl or cup!)2. Great taste - not too salty or spicy  (though it does have a high salt content)3. NO PRESERVATIVES! (aside from 650mg of salt per 1 cup serving)4. Completely vegetarian.The only negative is the amount of salt in each serving.

1. Nice Fit!2. Great sound quality.3. Easy to use controls with certain devices - depending on which one you purchase (for iOS, Android, etc.)4. Doesn't flop out of ears when you are running. (bonus!)5. Though pricey, it is a Bose and does last!

Finally something that truly is waterproof in material. You can wash it on a gentle cycle and tumble dry low. It zips fully around the mattress and any padding you might have on it up to 14 inches. The smallest sized mattress that will fit well is 9". Everything was great until I tried zipping it up. The mattress that I was putting into it still had plenty of room. It zips almost all the way down from one side to the other, so you slip the mattress in like a sock. Pretty cool, right? Not. As I zipped it closed around the mattress, I noticed that the zipper wasn't sealing very well at all. In fact, gentle pressure against the zipper split it wide open. Granted it is waterproof on both sides, but having a zipper break on you - thus exposing the mattress on the interior- negates the whole waterproofing thing. It felt well made, it just failed at being zipped closed. I might have gotten a lemon, but  I'm not willing to spend the money to try it again.

First, don't let the pictures scare you. Yes, this is a white nail polish but it comes out so much better than what the picture represents. I went straight to the manufacturer's website to see how they recommend application. There is a video on their site that goes over the four steps to gorgeous shiny white nails. This lacquer is only the second step. It will go on matte looking until you add a shiny overcoat. It's really easy to apply. Mind you, it's a little thinner than regular nail polish so it does require two to three coats to make nails look even. The awesome thing about having white nails is you can apply whatever decoration to your nail for an awesome pop. For instance, picture a deep red flower placed at the base of each nail with leaves going side to side. Instead of seeing color first, you see the flower first. There are a ton of other colors and each bottle is priced well. This particular product is currently $6.00 with Prime Shipping. Not bad considering how much a manicure can cost you (and that's just a one time thing!). I love that you can apply this as much or as little as you want for different looks. Oh, and the video is phenomenal on how to apply this particular one. You make an arch first - sweep to the right from center and left from center then bring down the center for a nice even look.  From the manufacturer's website;Probelle nail polish consists of a thin formula regulated to adhere to the nail plate evenly for a long lasting manicure. Light colors will require 2-3 coats whereas dark colors will require 1-2 coats, depending on the user. Why the thin formula? This nail polish formula is specially formulated to hold onto the nail plate for a longer lasting manicure. It is recommended to use Probelle's Hydrating Base Coat and Top Coat Sealer to guarantee longer lasting manicures.Top Quality, High gloss, Long Lasting Nail Lacquer.DBP, Toluene, and Formaldehyde Free.Directions: Gently shake bottle and apply 1 or 2 coats of nail lacquer to reach desired finish. *The use of any of our base coats is recommended for a longer lasting manicure.Size: .5 Fl Oz/ 15 mL

Having read other titles by the author I am a bit jaded on my opinion. I expected so much more out of the novel than what was given. And maybe that's why I can't give the book anymore than three stars. It was okay. You have your typical family curse where everyone seems to die in mysterious and often times horrible ways. The wedding where the bride has much to hide from those around her - especially the Press who would love to feed into the hype of family curses and her fiance who is a fantastic catch (heir to a fortune). It is the wedding of the century with the predictable twists and turns that brings a lot of light to shine on the secrets surrounding the families within the pages. Since it's so predictable to say anymore would fully give away the story, and we can't have that. If you've read some of the Author's other works, you might be disappointed like I was. However, the Author is a good writer and thus those who haven't yet been introduced to the writing will find the story to their liking, possibly.

What if you were born into a society where absolutely everyone was deaf, including you? Gazing at the world around you with eyes that can see, but ears that cannot hear? Fei has never known what it's like to hear the sound of anyone's voice. The society she is raised in puts value only on those who are gifted with sight and can create news, art, etc. with true artistic ability. Those who are not gifted, are sent to the mines to work until they are blind - then become beggars on the street until they die from illness and/or malnutrition.When Fei's sister begins to go blind, Fei begins to panic. Orphaned when their parents were forced to work in the mines until losing their sight, Fei is determined to keep her sister out of them. It is a daily struggle to remain at the top and receive just the right amount of food to stave off hunger. Miners receive much less and beggars none at all unless someone chooses to help them. To be artistic is life. Death is for those who are no longer "useful" to society.Then one day Fei begins to hear sounds in the most peculiar way and the book really takes off. The mystery of why the people of her village lost their hearing generations back and why some fall ill and lose sight becomes very clear. War breaks out and Fei must learn to tap into her inner strength to protect those she loves.This is a teen fantasy, so the normal unrequited love, love triangle, teen angst exists throughout the pages but doesn't detract from the perfectly woven story.

Absolutely the best ground coffee out there, and I'm extremely picky about my coffee. I prefer whole bean, but when it comes to flavored coffees, ground is best. (unless you are going to use your own flavored oil).  Personally, I do not like any sweetener or sugar in my coffee. I also am not a big fan of creamers to add flavor to coffee. Whatever flavor I purchase tastes great without adding a thing.

Purchased for a wedding. Comfortable enough to make it through ceremony and reception, but wouldn't wear all day. Great support throughout, though, to last 4-6 hours without too much discomfort. Heels are heels - such is the price of beauty.
Adorable, frilly and entirely girly. Perfectly priced, too! My little niece loves to wear her "pretties" and this is a favorite.

Bonfires and the end of summer are coming up quickly. What better way to celebrate the fall than with friends and family gathered together. Having everything we need for s'mores all in one box - so convenient! Not chintzy at all! And pricing out what it would cost buying each individual item, this is saving money -- not to mention there is currently a 15% off coupon and free Prime shipping (36 s'mores at $0.70ea). Hershey's is a favorite in this household, and this will definitely be on the "must order" list for parties and get togethers.

Wholly smokes! This wireless light (that won't work until you install the required amount of D batteries *insert sheepish grin*) is AWESOME! Aim it with the idea of what kind of lighting you want on your face. Deer caught in the headlights is not a pleasant setting when you are walking down the hallway in the middle of the night. The motion sensor is sensitive - which I happen to love. I've fallen, tripped and stepped enough times with the pets  and kids in this house that I'm very thankful for a light that warns me of danger lurking in front of me - but don't want to be blinded either. I'm buying a couple more (despite the price tag) to sit outside by the trash cans. Installation is so easy I do not require any help at all. I'm hoping the brightness of the lights will deter the wildlife from digging for trash treats around the home. Especially the skunks that like to stink up the neighborhood on trash pick up day. I'm mounting them at just the right height to blind them as they climb up on the trash cans. If that doesn't work, I am not sure what will. Thank you, Fulcrum, for making such a nifty (if not very thrifty) product!

I am definitely not one for nutritional drinks. They always taste like someone took cardboard, sweat, bark off a tree and shoved it into a bottle labeled for consumption. I was pleasantly surprised by the taste of boost. It didn't coat my mouth and tongue as if it was an anti-acid soupy liquid. It tastes like a malted shake. Surprise! I love that it's just the right serving size, too, so you don't feel like you have to drink Mount Kilimanjaro just to have a little health on the run in your daily diet. While I'm always leery of drinks on the run (sugars, unpleasant chemicals, etc.) I could see having this as a back up on the days when I'm flying out of the house like the Tasmanian devil.

1. It doesn't have an overpowering, knock-you-off-your-butt, scent like other axe products.2. It limits the amount a teen boy can douse themselves in.3. It keeps the ripe smell of teen sweat out of the air.4. It doesn't hurt the budget or the wallet.

When it comes to my kids, safety is a huge concern of mine. I am always looking for ways to keep them safe and healthy. I bought these for my husband in both the 'DARK NAVY' and the 'DARK PATINA'.SIZING: My husband wears a 38 x 31, so, figured I would have to order a 32" inseam and have them hemmed, (like we did before), but, after reading the Reviews saying these slacks run long now, I took a chance on ordering him a 38 x 30, and they are a perfect length for him; thus, they do run long. Not a colour for him at all, so returned those.The FIT, (and the FABRIC that drapes beautifully), is fabulous... he LOVES the Savane brand. He's worn 3-pair for the last 10-years! So, we definitely got our money's-worth. These slacks are easy to care for, they keep their crease, and no ironing or steaming is required... wash them, dry them, hang them, wear them. It doesn't get any better than that!

...should give this as a 'welcoming' gift to every babe born in their care.Every mental-health institution should too.Every psychiatrist and psychologist in private practice should as well.Every drug-rehab center, every social-services center, every group-therapy triage should follow suit.This CD is, bar none, the most self-securing, self-healing, self-welcoming music on the planet. I can't say enough about this scrubber... Perfect SIZE, Perfect Coarseness, Perfect NO-GLOVES-NEEDED cleaner.Where has this thing been all my life? Because of the HANDLE, I no longer need to wear gloves when scrubbing-out my shower or bathtub. I get a good grip on the thing and this allows for excellent scrubbing-pressure. Once the scrubber part has seen its better days, toss it and snap in a new one.

First of all, let's deal with the SIZING because it's a definite issue with this Robe.Here is the Sizing Chart they give: AND DON'T YOU BELIEVE A WORD OF IT!!!*Small/Medium: Will fit Chests 32-38 inches, Robe length 46 inches*Large/XL: Will fit Chests 40-44 inches, Robe length 48 inches*1X/2X: Will fit Chests 46-50 inches, Robe length 50 inches*3X-4X: Will fit Chests 52-58 inches, Robe length 52 inchesI'm a 1x all-day-long. I weigh 160-lbs, am 5'3" tall, have a 48-D bust, 40" waist, and 50" hips. After reading all the Reviews here, (and taking SPECIAL NOTE of the complaints about this Robe being HUGE), I ordered mine in a Small/Medium.And, of course, after placing my Order, I fretted that I made a mistake. NO WAY would I EVER fit in a Small/Medium! I haven't worn a Small/Medium size in, like, forever! *lol*So, I kept coming back and reading those Reviews to calm my nerves while telling myself over and over, 'You can always send it back', *lol*.Well, the Robe was delivered yesterday and all I can say is WOW WOW WOW!!! The Small/Medium size fits me perfectly! I don't have to do a thing to this Robe... I don't have to hem it, or shorten the sleeves. And the fact that this Small/Medium size actually ZIPS UP, (beautifully fitting my 1x hips, bust, waist, and belly), well, I just don't know what to say. I'm AMAZED!It's a shame the SIZING is so 'off' on this Robe, because it's a FANTASTIC piece of clothing. The Fleece is ULTRA-PLUSH, (meaning it's thick), making the Robe so COZY, WARM, and SOFT that I never want to take it off, *lol*.One of the other reasons I wanted this particular Robe, (besides the warmth of the Ultra-Plush Fleece which I so need as I live in the mountains at 7,500-ft), is the fact that it will ZIP-UP to just UNDER MY CHIN keeping my NECK WARM, (just like wearing a turtleneck only not tight at all). But, it's not like it's brushing-up against my chin or getting in the way of my chin. I'd say the neckpiece-portion of the Robe falls about 1-1/2" below my chin. Again, it's perfect.The LENGTH of the Robe comes just to the top of my feet... no dragging on the floor, so, no need to hem.The SLEEVES come just to the knuckles on my hands... a tidge too long, but, as I'm sitting here typing, the slack is taken up and the sleeve rests very comfortably at my wrists. If I were to do dishes in this Robe, I would have to roll-up the cuff.I WASHED & DRIED this Robe before actually wearing it. I tried it on first, of course, and when I decided it was a great fit, went ahead and washed on WARM and dried on DELICATE. NO SHRINKAGE.I can't say enough GOOD things about this Robe. I just placed an Order for another... two, actually. One for my sister, and another for me to keep for whenever this one wears-out. I NEVER want to be without this Robe... THAT'S how GOOD it is.So, buy it with CONFIDENCE. As long as you take into consideration the 'OFF-SIZING' and order accordingly, you will be pleased as punch with this purchase.p.s. Unfortunately, I cannot recommend this Robe to women who actually ARE, and wear, a Small/Medium size... it will just be far too big for you. This Robe, whether by design or accident, is fitted for Larger-sized women.

I cannot express just how perfect these socks are.First, a little background. I wear a size 9M shoe, 1x in clothing, am 5'3", and weigh 160-lbs. My calf circumference is 13" at the widest point. I'm also Type II Diabetic who suffers from nerve pain in my feet. Indeed, my feet are extremely sensitive to touch.Now then, these socks are so SOFT, it's just practically unbelievable. I've NEVER felt socks so soft to the touch before. They don't hurt my sensitive feet at all to wear them. Both the fleece inside them, and the material on the outside, is just soft as can be.The FLEECE on the inside provides both softness and WARMTH. My feet have been freezing over these past winter weeks, and these socks have solved that problem... both in my home and running around town. Now, mind you, they're not roasty-toasty like a 70% wool sock is, but they're warm enough to get you from the house to the car to the store (or wherever), and back again. If you're wanting to trudge around in the snow, then, no, these socks were not designed for that. In such a case, I would use them as a 'Liner' sock.They say these socks are 'OVER-THE-KNEE'. Maybe on a thinner person, but not on me. They come just to my knee, (quite comfortably so... no tugging, stretching, pulling to get them there). As it so happens, to my knee is just where I want them. There is a WIDE-BAND at the top of these socks, but in no way is it tight. These socks are stretchy, but stay put without cutting off your circulation.The price is fantastic... $11-bucks for 2-pair.Oh Yeah, I finally found the PERFECT sock for me, and I'm back for more!If all these things meet your criteria then, by all means, give these socks a try. Buy them with the utmost of confidence. I think you'll be very glad you did.

I LOVE this Nail Polish! The BRUSH is wide, so, holds more paint... two strokes and you're done. This Polish is also SATURATED with colour... ONE COAT is all you need. This particular colour, 'Royal Flush', is a very DEEP ROSE PINK. On my monitor, this colour looks like a bright Fuschia, practically neon! It isn't, it's a much darker, much more deep Magenta than a bright Fuschia.As for those complaining about 'chipping'... this Polish lasts me 3 weeks... NO CHIPPING. That's right, 3 WEEKS!For anyone who thinks you can apply Nail Polish without a BASE Coat and a TOP Coat and have no chipping, well, all I can say is 'You don't know the first thing about paint, let alone painting nails'.My nails are very long and natural, (measured from the Cuticle, 3/4" long). I've been giving myself manicures for 45-years, thus, I think it's safe to say that I know 'Polish' and that I know 'how' to paint nails.1. ALL Polish requires a BASE COAT of something in order for the Polish to adhere properly to the nail. To this end, the BEST is Orly's 'Ridgefiller'. Orly Base Nail Coat, Ridgefiller, 0.6 Ounce. It will give your nails a smooth canvas making the Polish glide on effortlessly, as it's supposed to. If, after the 'Ridgefiller' dries, (about 15-minutes), you feel any roughness, take your 'buffing' file and rub lightly over your nails. They will feel silky-smooth to the touch. Tropical Shine 4-Way Large Nail BufferAs well, the 'Ridgefiller' will keep AIR BUBBLES from ruining your manicure. Why? Because it fills-in the natural 'ridges' in your nails. These 'ridges' trap air. And this air eventually finds its way up thru the Polish as bubbles.2. Apply the Polish. As I said, this particular Polish, and colour, is so saturated with pigment, you only need one coat. It is thicker than other Polishes, so you've got a lot of maneuverability with this Polish. As an aside, it doesn't matter if you get Polish on the skin surrounding your nail, this will be erased at the end of the drying process. So, if the Polish isn't applied 'perfectly', don't worry about it.3. Once the Polish is dry, (I let ALL Polishes dry for an hour), you need to apply a TOP COAT. To this end, the BEST is Brucci 'Acrylic Top Coat', (you can get this at Sally's). This stuff makes your Polish last seemingly forever! As I said, I get 3-weeks out of this Polish all-the-while cooking, cleaning, and doing dishes all day long (without gloves), as well as typing on the computer. Once-a-week, I apply another coat of the Brucci TOP COAT and it keeps my nails looking fantastic. Truly, I have to give myself a manicure with new Polish because my nails have grown so far out from the cuticle, not because the Polish is chipping off.4. To clean-up mistakes from applying the Polish, you can use a 'Corrector Pen' such as niceeshop(TM) 5 Pcs Acetone Nail Art Polish Corrector Remover Pen with 15 Changeable Tips,Random Color. For me, I just use an Orange Stick and shreds of cotton from a cottonball. I dip this in Polish Remover and rub off any mistakes in application. Debra Lynn Orange Wood Sticks (Pack of 144)
