She decides to move to a new town because her favorite newspaper wrote about the town and moved there. to Wishing Springs Texas.Bo Monahan's life as been different since his sister-in-law wrote about the town of Wishing Springs Texas and all the good looking single cowboys there.  He even was on tv being interviewed talking about his business. He makes  stirrups.  He is not ready to settle down.Abby almost hits a steer on her way into town. and ends up in ditch with air bags deploy and faints in front of Bo.  Who she recognizes.Next day Bo finds out he has a baby and the mother is dead.  So Abby ends up helping him.Deals a lot with forgiveness, alcoholics and choices we make in life.I like to read Debra Clopton's books and look forward to reading the next book in the series.I was given this ebook by Net Galley and Thomas Nelson to read for free.  In return I agreed to give a honest review of Counting on a Cowboy.
came fast, big paperclips  and they work.  just what I needed.  worth the price

3 STARSThis is the 4th book in the Hattie Davish mystery series.  The first one that I have read.  It had a few mysteries that Hattie figures out.  Lots of suspects, lot of history.  Charming story Hattie Davish is a private secretary.  She has solved a few murders in the past.  Hattie is now alone in the world.  We see her going back reliving her memories of her family and at school.  Her typewriter is important to her.Hattie has some back home to her hometown of St. Joseph, Missouri, for her friend, Virginia Hayward's father funeral.  He has had a lot of damage to his face but Hattie does not think it is her father that is in the casket.Mrs. Chaplins School for Women that Hattie and Virginia went to welcome her back like she is a celebrity.  She is famous for working with socialites and helping catch murders.  There are things not right with the school.  Someone wants her to look into it.The setting is St. Joseph, Missouri in late 1890's.  Where travel was by train, horses. People wrote letters.I would read another book by Anna Loan Wilsey.  The story was well told, interesting and had smart female characters.  It was also a clean read.I was given this ebook to read by Net Galley and Kensington.  In return I agreed to give a honest review of A Deceptive Homecoming and be part of it's blog tour.

This is a book set in a college town of Mahina, Hawaii.  I sure hope the stuff that happened here does not go on where my girls are going to college.  There is murder, cheating, and the students don't get held accountable for the wrongs they do.What would you do for your children?  Do we complain when they are got cheating?  want them to have second chances. Where do we stop fixing things for them?  What is best?There is plenty of drama, romance, mystery and characters that I like In Musubi Murder.  The main character is Molly Barda a college professor who is untenured so she has to do the crummy jobs.  She is single.  Her two co-workers that are her friends Emma  Nakamura and Patrick Flanagan.  They like to drink her coffee.Molly has to go to a breakfast honoring Jimmy Tanaka who is one of the most hated man in Hawaii because he donated a lot of money to the college.  There is protest there and Jimmy is a no show.Molly does meet Donnie Gonsalves owner of Donnie's Drive-Inns.  She finds him attractive.  His son is one of her students.Jimmy is found to be murdered.  Molly finds some clues with the help of her friends.There are plenty of suspects, lots of people are upset with Jimmy and his business practices.There are some images that made me want to gag thinking about the murders.I would be willing to see what happens next to Molly and her friends.I was given this ebook to read for free and in return I agreed to give a honest review of The Musubi Murder and be part of its blog tour.

I could have used this book decades ago and today.  I also want my daughter to read it too and she has been home over a year.  It reminds you of things that you did on your mission is still vital for your eternal life and to prosper in this life.To remember to pray daily. Study the scriptures daily, set goals in all areas of your life , dating advice and other important things for your life.I know for me reading this right before the Sabbath day helped me have a more uplifting sabbath day.Because I followed some of the points in this book.  Yes I admit that I had heard most of these points many times but the stories,  quotes and examples have stuck with me.This would be a good book to give a return missionary in your life.I was given this ebook to read from Cedar Fort in return I agreed to read and review 10 Questions to Answer After Serving a Mission honest and be part of its blog tour.

My biggest complaint about the book is that it ended where it did.  I was not ready for it to end.There were plenty of mystery and lots of dramas. Lots of drinking.  Lots of characters I wanted to know more about.This is the third book in the series but the first one I have read.  It does a fair job of standing alone but made me want to read the first two stories. I have now gone and read the first two books of the series and enjoyed them both.Mackenzie Dalton owns Mack's bar.  She likes homicide detective Duncan.  There are some problems where they can't be together unless they sneak it.  Mack has some unique gifts that help her solve some murder cases.There is a group of regulars at the bar that like to solve mysteries. With Mack helping with her gifts. They are called the Capone Club.  A member has asked for them to look in his sister's murder  They have cops, doctor, retired and many different skill sets they bring.Mack had a bunch of reporters want to know more about her and how she helped solved cases.  She even got a sack of fan mail some good, some crack pot and one that is challenging her to solve clues and if she brings cops into it someone she knows will be killed.She takes it seriously and only tells three of her trusted friends for advice and they think of a plan to tell Duncan without anyone else knowing.There enters a another guy in Mack's life that she likes.  She is fake dating him and it seems to real.There is a lot going on in this book.  I had things figured wrong for most of the book.  I hope the next book comes out fast.The setting is Milwaukee in winter.I was given this ebook to read by Net Galley and Kensington books.  In return I agreed to give a honest review of In The Drink and be part of it's blog tour.

4 STARSThis is a good mystery that I still guessing till the end. I liked the characters.  The tarot cards is still confusing for me but interesting.  This is a clean cozy murder mystery.  It left me wanting to read the next book in the series.Alanis McLachlan has inherited her mother's store White Magic Five & Dime and found a sister.  Alanis plans to make right to the customers that her mom conned.Marsha is abused wife. Who was coming to her mother's business multiple times a week. Alanis tries to be her friend and convince her to divorce her husband and file charges.  Instead someone killed her husband with a baseball bat.  Marsha is the main suspect.Alanis was raised to con and fraud.  Till she was able to runaway from her mom.  She had not seen her mom for decades and surprised that her mom left her the business. Alanis uses her talents of lying and cons to try and prove Marsha's innocent.There is a lot of tarot card reading and the meanings.  As Alanis is trying to learn how to read tarot cards.The setting is Berdache, Arizonia.  They are known for the one vortex they have out in the desert.I was given this ebook to read by Harlequin and Midnight Ink .  In return I agreed to give a honest review of Fool Me Once.

This is  book intended for LDS audience about Temples.  With a lot of sources about the Temples from scriptures, ensigns , conference talks and other books.He treats the Temple ordinances with respect and sacredness.  Gives a lot of information that I have not known or thought about with the history of covenants and Temples.Also teaches you that the real teacher is God to listen to him and learn about him.  That he will answer are prayers and teaches us. That he will always keep his covenants and promises if we do.I know that I plan to go to temple and pay closer to so many things , with a prayer to understand more.I could read this book many times to really learn more each time.I was given this ebook to read by Cedar Fort Publishing and in return agreed to give a honest review of Understanding Your Endowment and be part of its blog tour.

I've never had a hammock before and was excited to get one. I wanted one for our outings, first thinking of camping, then my mind wandered to all the times we go to the park or the beach to hang out and BBQ. There are so many outings this would have come in handy.I was expecting this elaborate big hammock and was pleased to see just how compact it is. It's all folded up in this very manageable bundle. As a matter of fact, the pouch that is is kept in is attached to the hammock material, so that's even more convenient. This kit includes the straps and metal rings that you need to put it up. It's so simple to put up.The material is super thin so I was worried about it's durability but it actually is very tough. I like that you can put it back easily too. It folds up just as easily as unfolding and you can stuff it back into it's pouch for storage. It takes up very little room.Nevermind camping, I wanna take this to our next beach BBQ. We like to set up a little picnic area in the tree line instead of being out in the sun and this will be perfect.I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I've been using this bluetooth shower speaker for about a week and really like it. The big selling points for me was the fact that it suctions to the shower wall and the FM radio. The suction works out great but I am less the FM radio leaves me wanting.I tried out this product without grand expectations for blowout sound quality. I do expect however for it to live up to it's product decription. With the exception of the FM radio, I do believe it does.I put it to work right away and am really glad that I have this in my shower. I have other speakers that are water resistent also but they aren't made for the shower, so I have to set them just outside the shower and the sound is muffled. With this shower speaker, it goes directly on the wall of the shower and you get a nice loud sound. Now, you are not getting some super high tech stereo quality sound, but my music is loud and clear. The shower amplifies the sound even more. Even with the water running, it doesn't take away from that.I have tile walls in my shower and the suction cup has held up nicely. I haven't had it fall on me once.I was excited to see that it has FM radio because sometimes you just wanna play music when you are already in the shower and forgot to activate the bluetooth on your phone and get some music going. There is no display, so you don't know what station you are on. There is a scan function but that is not good.....it only scans to static and lesser known stations. Now, I have hit the arrow buttons to the left and right and manually moved through the stations until I found the one with music I like. The station comes through clear once I do though. When I turn it off and back on, then press the FM button my station does stay there and I don't dare hit scan again because I'm scared I will lose the station again.The water resistant function of this product is great. This is not fully waterproof though. It can survive a splash or even water sprayed onto it by the shower head but do not immerse this in water.So, bottom line is I do really like this shower speaker, but not a fan of the process to find an FM station.I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

These are great dry bags. Most other companies sell them in 10L, which I have one already. This set is fantastic because you get a huge 20L and a little 5L dry bag.Basically a dry bag is made of this rubbery PVC Tarpaulin material which when you roll the top down over itself several times, creates a water tight seal, keeping your belongings safe from water leaks. It's really the combination of that tight seal and the air caught inside the bag that helps make that tight seal together.Throw your items in the bag. Don't flatten the bag...let the air remain and start rolling down the top in tight rolls. Over and over until you can't roll it anymore. On either end of the roll is a buckle. Turn the sides up to the point where you can buckle the two sides together. You should have a nice tight seal.The size selection sets this apart from others I've tried. The larger one also has a 5 x 7 clear window to look in to see your items and a valve to help decompress air from for storage. it comes with a shoulder strap for easy carrying.I have used dry bags in the ocean, carrying my items with me as the bag floated on the top of the water along with me. This way I didn't have to fear leaving my important stuff back at the towels and stuff at the beach. Dry bags work great for me and I swear by them. When you do get them wet, the top may get wet and a drop or two of water might go inside the bag as you open it. While tightly closed, no water comes in. Let them dry all the way out before storing and rinse any salt water off as soon as you can.I gave this set a test in the bathtub and shower and they both worked great. I can't wait for our next beach trip.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

This is such a cute bag for the comic book nerd in all of us. I wasn't really into comics growing up, but with movie after movie coming out and my teenage son being a fan of comics, I've grown to love them too.This tote is Marvel trademarked. The super heroes are pictured on the front with I ONLY DATE SUPER HEROES written on it. This kind of funny is right up my alley and I use it proudly.  Obviously I love the design but the quality of the bag and stitching are high quality as well. It's a typical tote size which is great for me to bring to work or even to the gym. This week it has been my take-to-work tote and I've gotten compliments on it.I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I've been using these Brainwavz in-ear monitors aka earphones for a couple weeks and am really liking the sound they produce. They have a sleek design and are well made.Out of the package I received:earphoneshard caseshirt clips/m/l sets of silicone tipsbi-flange and tri-flange silicone tipsfoam tipsinstructionsBrainwavz has gone above and beyond to provide not only a very nice working pair of earphones but all the tips you could need to get the perfect feel and size for you. The case is also very cool with it's red and black design. The case has mesh compartments on each side so you can store your extra tips in.I will start off by saying I like everything about these earphones. I've been listening to a variety of music, TV shows and even text to voice and they have not let me down. I am not a professional but I do like the way they make my music sound. While not noies cancelling, they do cut out a lot of outside noise. If someone speaks to me while they are in, I have to pause my music and take out one to hear what is being said to me. Even while no music is playing, they block out a lot of outside noise.I really like the sleek red and black design. The cord is flat which doesn't tangle as easily as round cords and it just looks cooler. The housing is a sturdy metal. I like the way they clack together while I'm handling the earphones.After trying all the tips, I have decided that the tri-flange tips are my go-to favorite. They just fit my small ears so nicely. I am really intrigued by the foam tips because I've never had those come with a pair of earbuds before, but I found them difficult to remove to change out without fear of damaging them and your ear wax gets stuck in the pores of the foam.Bottom line, they look cool and sound cool. I had no hints at all of crackling or muffled sound. The sound was crisp and clear, hitting hard with the bass tones but not overwhelmingly so.I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

Getting this pillowcase, I really didn't have much expectation. I wanted a pillow case for my daughter's body pillow. I was happy to find that this pillowcase is so very soft. It is white and has almost a sheen to it and feels cool to the touch when you move. I love when you move and have a nice cool section.There isn't much to add. It's a body pillow case that is amazingly soft and fits great. It has high praise in the reviews and for good reason. We really like ours.I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I've tried a different type of travel pillow before; the type with the little bean bag filler balls inside. I really do like that style but was interested when I saw that this travel pillow has memory foam with cooling gel.This pillow is amazing. When I first opened the package, I was surprised at how heavy the pillow was. It arrived in it's cloth carrying case. Once you pop it out of the case it expands quite a bit. It has a sturdy form that is shaped to fit around your neck perfectly. The material is cotton and polyester with a valour feel.Even though you'd expect a valour pillow to be warm and overheat you with regular use, it's memory foam inside with cooling gel keeps you cool. I don't fully understand how that works but it's awesome. You get that cozy feel but it still feels nice.There is a clasp in the front to help keep it secure. It is curved, so your head rests naturally on it. I have issues with feeling trapped or sufficated in certain situations and I can use this without any problems.I am going on a road trip next month in Sept and can't wait to bring this along. I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This solar powered light is so simple to set up and use. You can set it up and use right away when you get it. When I took the items out of the box, I had the light that has LED lights along the bottom and solar panel along the top. The light comes with 3M sticky pads and screws so you can mount it with your choice. It also has instructions and a small pin tool.When looking at the light, there are no buttons to press or compartments that open. It is a fairly simple design with an indention to hang it with a screw on the back. At the front, there is a small hole, with icon indicating that that is the power control. This is where that small pin tool comes in. To turn it on, you simply take that little tool and press into the hole. It is now on. The high / low light adjustments will happen automatically and you don't have any more control of it.When it gets dark, it will emit a low light, and with the LED, that is still pretty bright. Once it detects motion, it will emit a bright light with the LED lights. During the day, the light will charge automatically for you. This light is so drama free. You literally turn it on, hang it up and don't have to mess with it again.I played around with different places to put it, finally settling on the front of my house by our front door. There is a solar light further out in the yard, but with this being right by the front door, it will light up while we are trying to get our key into the door.I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I will start off by saying that I am not a germophobe and I'm not scared to touch a soap container for fear of germs, so I need it to be hands-free. I do, however appreciate convenience and this soap dispenser provides me just that.This motion sensor soap dispenser by Ohuhu has a great look and works great. It has a nice chrome finish to it and looks great along my sink; much better than a store bought soap dispenser. You can put whatever you'd like in it. I debated using this for a dish soap dispenser but decided to use it for hand soap.It's powered by 4 AA batteries that are not included. In the packaging you will find a key. That is what you use to afix the bottom to it. Add the batteries and put on the black bottom. Use the key to lock it. Find somewhere safe for the key where you won't lose it.To add soap, you just push the top off and unscrew the top of the soap storage. Fill it up and close the top. You are now good to go. It has a motion sensor, so you just place your hand underneath and it will drop a little bit of soap.We originally put it in my kids bathroom but I kept going in there to find soap dispensed all over the bottom piece and all around it. We then moved it to the kitchen and have not had one incident. Upon further investigation, I discovered that our cat really likes the kids sink and it was his tail swishing back and forth that made the soap dispense. It's been in our kitchen for over a week now and it's working perfectly.We have been doing a lot of yard work this week and it's so convenient to just have it dispense a bit of soap in your hand and wash up. There is also a wall mount and hardware, but I have that put away because I like it on the sink counter.I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

These lights are so tiny but very bright. The battery pack is also small, so it they can be easily be incorporated in a decorate center piece or even a funky outfit.My mind is racing with all the possibilities and I'm thinking that I want to incorporate them into a costume for Halloween coming up. I saw a post for a jelly fish costume that uses an umbrella and lights. It has me excited.The lights are entwined into a bendable metal that you can wind around stuff. I also like the use of them with centerpieces and flowers. I will really only be using these for special occasions because the battery life is only 24 hours. Now, I did find a listing for a 10 pack of the batteries for only $6, so the replacement batteries are fairly cheap.I got to try out each of the 5 colors and they do not dissapoint. For being these tiny LED lights, they are super bright. They look adorable as decoration with the different colors, but again, I don't want to drain the batteries so I don't turn them on often.The batteries are fairly easy to install and the battery door snaps closed. There is an on / off switch on the battery case.I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

These have so many uses, I wouldn't even really call them a scarf. As someone who lives in FL, I really don't wear scarves often. I do however wear cloth headbands and bandanas around my head to keep my hair under control with the FL humidity.When I saw this "scarf set, it was different than any that I've tried and I was excited to try them out. You get a set of 3. It is a long tube of fabric that is seamless. The fabric is a super soft material, almost reminding me of a thinner version of those maxi dresses / skirts.  They have a silky sheer quality to them and are stretchy.Each one of this set has a different set of skull designs. The black / grey skull design is my favorite and I've worn it almost every day. One of them also has a design that you can put on like a mask from the nose down and it looks like the bottom part of a skull and the top part from the eyes up. These are clever ideas to wear over your face when riding a motorcycle to cover your nose and mouth from bugs.The way I've been wearing mine is mostly a headband style. I just scrunch it up or fold it up, depending on my mood and slide it over my head to function as a headband. When I wear my hair down, I'll allow more of the fabric out to act more like a headband. I like that I don't have to tie or buckle anything. It's so easy to put on and they stay put.This is the first time for me trying this style and I'm completely sold.  Love them! As I'm writing this, I am wearing the black / grey one.I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

Ah, how I love Van Gogh. Obviously one of the most popular artists and for good reason.This is a print of the famous The Starry Night on canvas over a wood frame. The print that I have is 16 x 20 inches and the smallest selection from the choices listed here. I think that this size works out great for me, but if you want larger, they have other choices.The print is beautiful. The colors are so vibrant and the way the canvas wraps around the frame, gives it an added effect. There are two hooks / screw sets that come with it for hanging. I found it very easy to hang and love the way it looks on my wall.I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I tried out this bicycle pump on both our bicycle and a football. There was some trial and error on my part, but I think I got it down now.When I first saw that this has a bike mount, I thought that it would be so handy to have this with your bike at all times. Then I went out to our bicycles and realized that none of ours has a spot to mount anything to it's frame. Until we get new bikes, that feature really doesn't benefit us.I tried out the bicycle tire first. Even though there are pictures in the instructions, I still had some difficulties getting the little lever to go up and stay up. It was hard to push and wouldn't stay, especially when I was trying to maneuver between the spokes. What I ended up having to do is place it as firmly as I could onto the valve with the lever down, then try to keep it still while I pressed hard on the lever to get it upright and locked for it to stay. Once I was able to get it in that position, I was good to go. I could pump the hand pump easily and it pushed air into the tire. It did take quite a bit of pumping because it is so little.Then I tried it out on a super deflated football we had in the house. I used the same method for putting in the ball pin that was included. I inserted it all the way, then raised the lever to the point where it wouldn't come back down. I inserted into the ball and started pumping. It seemed like I was pumping forever and not much was happening. Upon further inspection, I realized that the hole was bigger than the pin and most of the air was coming back out instead of into the ball. I used my fingers to clamp around it to force the air into the ball and it was faster going after that.Bottom line, this does work, if you use it right. With this being so small, I really won't be using it to pump up the bikes before going out. I'll still use the big pump for that. However, it does work well for an emergency pump. I still really like the idea of having it attached to your bicycle while out. Even though I don't have holes to screw it to my frame, I think I will still try and fashion a way to put it on there.I received this product for a discounted rate or free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I've had this digital timer for a couple weeks now and have been using it regularly. It's so sleek and simple, yet works so very well.This desgin almost reminds me of an apple product with it's white minimalistic design. It's white and round  with only two icons on it, indicating where to press.To use, you just rotate the outside rim to the right and it will increase in 10 second intervals. You control the speed, so if you only want it set for a couple minutes you can go slower, and if you want it for longer, you can move it faster, slowing as you near the number you want.You start and stop with the triangle (play) icon and reset it with the square icon. It will only reset while it is stopped. I've been using it mostly for cooking and I've taken it outside with me while grilling to keep up with what is cooking inside the house. The beeping isn't super loud. You can hear it loudly if it's in the same room, but you won't if it's in another room. It will beep for 60 seconds and I like that as it's beeping, it will count up.....so you can see how long you are over your target time when you get to the timer to turn it off.The display is digital. It's large and easy to read. One interesting feature of this timer is there is no on/off button. At first, that had me concerned that it would drain the battery but this is such a simple design, it doesn't drain the battery like I'd thought. After all, I have watches with more going on and they've lasted me years. I have no worries with the battery going out.Last but not least, the magnet. This has come in handy because I can just put it on the hood over the stove while I cook and it's at eye level. The magnet is built into the back of the timer and it's pretty strong.I only have positive things to say about this timer. It's so nice and would make a great gift also.I received this product for a discounted rate or free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This is a really nice, high quality set of tools for blackheads.Now, I know the entire topic of pimples and blackheads is gross, but the fact is we get them and have to deal with them. In my teens, I struggled very bad with acne and became a picker, leaving scars in my face in places. I was never concerned that what I was doing to my face could scar and how that would effect me.Well, now my own children are teens and I am seeing them struggle with acne and even worse blackheads than I had experienced when I was younger. I have been trying to help them with proper hygiene and with whiteheads / blackheads. To them it's torture, but I feel they need it done with a gentle hand, so they won't end up with scars like I did.This kit is perfect for our needs. I'd bought a tool that was cheap and flimsy. Every piece in this kit is so much more sturdy and much higher quality. They are the caliber of tools that you will find in a professional's office. There are 7 tools that include one angled mirror and 6 double sided tools with various loops, slotted ends, round cutouts, etc. that you can use to help remove whiteheads / blackheads.I would recommend doing your research to make sure you are using them correctly. There is no instruction book or pamphlet that comes with this set. I am very careful that I am not damaging the skin in any way when I use them.I truly was not expecting such high quality tools when I ordered this kit and I am so happy with them. They have helped me so much with taking care of my kids skin.I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I have been using the See Me Here BV350 wireless bluetooth speaker for about a week and I am really impressed.I had tried other wireless speakers and this one is so durable and impressive in so many ways.Out of the package:Bluetooth speakerBicycle Mount w/ screwsInstructionsAudio cableMicro-USB charging cableCaribinerWe will definitely be getting a lot of use out of this speaker. It's very rugged in it's design. The outside has a rubberized feel to it, so less likely to be damaged if accidentally dropped or tossed around with your gear. It's black and dark green which resonates well with manly men. My hubby loves it.You can choices on how you play music through it.Connect to BluetoothUse male to male audio cable to connect to devicePlay directly from Micro SD cardIt is charged with a micro-USB charging cable that is included. A full battery can play up to 8 hours. There are indicator lights on the front to show the battery charge.Control the volume and play/pause functions with the button at the top. Press to play/pause and turn to control the volume. I should note that when you control the volume, it is specific to the speaker. Adjusting that does not make the adjustment on your phone itself.If using the Micro SD card, you have an up and down button along the front that you can use to go back and forth through the music on it.It was a breeze to connect to Bluetooth and I was surprised at how far the reach went. Not only how far, but how strong the signal was. I have tried other bluetooth products that work great for 30 meters in open spaces, but if the device and speaker are separated by a wall or large piece of furniture it will start to break up. This speaker is fantastic. I can walk into my master bathroom while the phone is still sitting on my kitchen table. That is two walls separating them and it sounded great.The sound quality is very clear and it can get very LOUD. The speakers completely surround it, so you get a nice all around sound. Now, when you turn it on or connect, there is a voice indicator. It sounds garbled to me and at first I didn't even know what it was saying. After using it for a while, I recognize when it is saying "bluetooth mode" and "connected". Turning it on and off you hear a little chime noise.We still plan to get new bicycles but I am excited that I will be able to mount this speaker when I do. It also includes a caribiner to hang on your backpack or bag. This speaker is also water resistent. It does say not to submerge it in water, so I am reluctant to call it waterproof. I have not put it to the waterproof test as of yet.I have only the greatest things to say about this bluetooth speaker. I see no downside at all. It is very high quality.I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

One of the constant gripes in our household is where the toenail clippers are. I keep a tiny pair of fingernail clippers for myself in my purse, but somehow my family can't seem to keep track of the toenail clippers. Obviously we have had several pairs over the years.I got this toenail clippers set not really expecting much but was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the clippers. There is also a bonus case and emery board that comes with it.The size is very nice at 3 inches. You can really use them for either toenails or fingernails. They are stainless steel and very sturdy. That way you know they won't rust if exposed to water or even left in a pocket and accidentally washed. (happens quite often with us. Our 12 year old is on laundry duty and never checks pockets)What I found unique about this set of nail clippers is they have this groove for your thumb that really helps keep a good grip on it while using them. They make a solid cut and the blades are sharp. You don't need to apply very much pressure at all.I keep the clipper and the emery board in the little pouch provided and it has a permanent home in our bathroom, so when the family asks me where they are, I can answer with confidence.I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

My daughter loves this 18 pack of chalk markers.We've had other chalk markers in the past but they didn't have this color variety that this pack has.Chalk markers are so much fun because you can write on mirrors, windows and other non-porous surfaces. We even write our shopping list on our microwave with ours. I bought a sheet of chalkboard contact paper that my daughter likes to draw murals on. She loves that the colors in this pack allow her to create more things. There is a peach color that she is excited to use for skin color.Chalk markers are super easy to use.  Each one has the colored cap that identifies what color is inside. The tip comes dry and can be flipped around for you to choose whether you want to write with a rounded tip or a chisel tip. To activate, you press down on the tip to release the air inside, and give it a good shake. Now press again for a bit until the ink fills in the marker tip. It might take about a minute to completely fill in.Now you are good to go and write notes or decorate. You can celebrate with writing on car windows, write notes to each other on mirrors, or like us, write your shopping list on your microwave. We put our markers to use and love them. These markers provide a nice full vibrant color with their writing.It's super easy to clean up. After all, these go on wet but dry like chalk. You can use a damp cloth and it wipes right away. If you are unsure of a surface, I'd try a bit on a corner out of the way before using the markers. Don't use on clothing or walls.We have a lot of fun and love the unique colors that come with this pack. It deserves 5 stars in my book. I have nothing negative to say at all.I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

When I first got this, I thought it was cool but wasn't sure how often it would really get used, with the exception of the pen and stylus. I've surprised myself at how often having a screwdriver and level is handy to have in your purse. This little gadget 6 in 1 pen can do that and more.Pen: Writes in black in and writes nicely. Turn the tip to show / hide the writing tip.Stylus: Opposite end of the pen. In there very sturdy with good flexibility. Works great with my phone.Ruler: Built into the side of the pen. Shows up to four inches.Level:Also built into the side of the pen. Style is a hexagonal shape, so the pen lays flat and doesn't roll. Easy to read.Flathead screwdriver &Phillips screwdriver: Opposite the pen side, removable peice with flathead screwdriver tip on one side and phillips on the other. It's held in there by a rubber bumper. Stays secure when screwdriver is in use.Also note that when you unscrew the stylus to display the screwdriver, you don't have to lose the stylus tip. Just screw it onto the pen side. There is also a metal clip along the side of the pen to hang onto your shirt, notepad, etc.This gadget pen really does so many things and I've put to use a number of times since I've gotten it. It's so little and light, that it's easy to keep with you. I keep mine in my purse.I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

How adorable is this cat litter mat!?We have a one cat household and he makes his fair share of mess with loose litter around the box. We've even started using a high walled rubbermaid bin as his box, which does help with him tossing litter out. It doesn't get rid of the litter that gets stuck on his paws though.The Two Meows cat litter mat is working out great for us. We have it placed right outside his box, so the first couple steps he takes is on the mat. The litter gets trapped in the unique design of the mat. It looks like it should be really bristly but it's actually a super soft silicone rubbery material. The back is also rubbery so it doesn't slip or move around at all.To wash mine, I just take it under the sprayer in the shower and it rinses out very easily. Not only does it work really well, it is absolutely adorable. Love the paw shape!I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This is a great case for larger headphones, like Bluetooth sets. The case is soft, yet hard cover to properly protect your headphones. The inside of the case has a nice mesh pocket on both sides that can keep two sets of headphones or one set and a charging cable. The possibilities are up to you. While it is a bit bulky, your headphones will be protected. The case also looks great. Very nice, larger case.

The Paper Mate Profile pens are a long time favorite of mine. They may not be as fancy as the new Ink Joy line, but these are better quality pens. They are extremely smooth to write with and very comfortable to hold. If you need to do a lot of writing, these pens are a joy. I also love the variety of colors. They are not refillable, but are very long lasting. There is a lot of ink in these pens. Paper Mate should be advertising these instead of the cheaply made Ink Joy line. Great pens for a great price.

I tend to prefer on ear or over ear headphones, since they are easier to use and don't fall off. I was offered a free pair of these Bluedio headphones in exchange for an honest review, so I decided to give these a chance. The headphones arrive in a nice, full color box and are a bit heavier than expected. There is the headphones, my set also says Bluedio, flange tips and ear pieces, along with a charging cable and instructions. Please note that there is no carrying pouch, so you will need to purchase one. The flange tips were not installed and I had to put those on. They are the white tips that help them stay in your ears. I had a hard time changing the ear pieces, since they were small. The headset fits ok, for me it was not as comfortable, since I have more trouble with in ear pieces. Once I found the right fit the headset worked well. Pairing is easy. There is a too small LED pin light that flashes blue when turned on, pairs and stays on while charging. I personally would prefer a larger light that is easier to see, but it does work. Charging is fast and the set arrived 3/4 full. Sound quality is clear and good, but very light on bass. Music, videos and calls sound good and the set handles water well. This is a nice pair of headphones that look great and work well.

I am generally not a fan of in ear headsets. The QCY headphones have changed my mind. This is a fantastic, well made and high quality Bluetooth headphone set. They arrive in an elegant cardboard package, with two boxes inside; one for the headphones and one for the instructions, charging cable and ear tips. Please Note: the manual states that the set includes a drawstring carry bag. It Does Not. You will need to purchase a carrying case. The instructions are clear and easy to follow. My set arrived fully charged. The on off button is large and easy to see and use. Pairing is a breeze and the sound quality is excellent, better than several sets of Panasonic headphones I have. It is rich, full stereo sound for music, movies and call quality. I tend to use my phone for controlling play and not the headset. They handle water well and actually stayed in my ears. They last a full hour workout, battery life is great and charging is fast. If you are a fan of lightweight headphones, you may want to have several pairs. This is a really fantastic set of high quality headphones that work for a great price.Please note that I received a free pair in exchange for an honest review. I am normally not a fan of in ear headphones, but these really are great.

I regularly take Co Q10 and was curious to try this formulation from Viva Labs. Like many supplement providers, Viva touts their formulation as advanced, pharmaceutical grade and easily absorbed. This bottle is 100MG of Co Q10 and includes Black Pepper fruit extract, extra virgin olive oil, gelatin, vegetable glycerin, purified water and beeswax. The capsules are small, dark colored oval shaped that are very small and easy to swallow. I've never seen dark capsules for Co10, they are normally light colored. Having taken these for several weeks, I can't say that I've noticed any difference. I normally take a 200MG higher dose cap from a direct manufacturer and Viva Labs version didn't really impress me. I didn't feel any noticeable difference. When I take my regular version, I will feel more energy. I didn't feel much of anything from the Viva Labs version. Good Co Q10 formulations should be fairly pure without fillers and additives. This isn't as pure and is not made by Viva Labs. Another company manufacturers it for them. It's just an ok product. There are much better versions out there. At least they give you 150 capsules in a bottle.

This is a new and unique product. It is a lightning and micro USB charging cable. The lightning will work with Apple devices and the micro USB will work with devices like the Kindle. The cable is high quality and I've how the charging attachments are linked by a short cable cord. Both stay attached, yet easily moved depending upon the device being charged. Charging is fast and smooth. Please note that I received a free copy in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. The cable I received looks different from the one pictured, but is a slightly different version of this product. It still works well.

This set of earphones by Sooyo is a high quality set that is a great replacement or addition for the Apple earphones. They are packaged similarly and look and feel nearly identical. The Apple set has a thicker cable. The sound quality and ease of use of the Sooyo headphones is fantastic. Music sounds rich and full in stereo. Call quality is also great, I can hear callers well and they can hear me. Since Apple now charges $30 for replacement earphones, this is a great cost effective solution. You can have several extra pairs without breaking the bank. This is the first set of Apple style earphones that works as well as the original that I have come across.I received a free pair in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. Questions or comments are welcome.

I have been an Oral B brush user for many years. I was curious to try the Sonicare, since several friends have mentioned how much they love their Sonicare brushes. This is an advanced brush. It comes with a complete set of accessories; the brush handle, an AdaptiveClean brush head, an InterCare brush head for plaque removal, a travel charger with brush head storage, a deluxe travel case and two hygienic travel caps. The travel caps don't enclose the brush heads completely, so I suggest that you purchase some caps. A great one is made by Dr. Things. They are natural and biodegradable.  The brush handle is lightweight and fairly comfortable in the hand, although you do have to be careful not to hit the buttons while brushing. The handle has a nice round on/off button, three LED lights to show whether you are using Low, Medium or High intensity, with a rocker button to change that setting and three modes for cleaning. Clean is the standard and runs for about 2 1/2 minutes.  The White setting is for polishing your teeth, which lasts two minutes and my favorite, Deep Clean, which lasts three minutes. There is a battery shaped LED to show battery strength with three circles below it.If you are coming from an Oral B brush, it will take a bit of adjustment to get used to this brush. Oral B's run until you turn them off and tend to need more charging time. The brush head replacements are also cheaper and come in a variety of types, with the sensitive head a small round brush head. Oral B's brush heads also tend to reach the gum area more. Sonicare's brush heads are larger and don't impact the gum area as much. My gums would be a bit sore using Oral B's brush heads until I switched to the sensitive head. I had no problems with the Sonicare brush heads irritating my gums. It is quieter in operation and nearly lasts three weeks between charges. Because I use the deep clean mode, I tend to charge mine around two weeks. This is quite liberating, since I had to charge my Oral B twice a week since I brush a bit longer. My teeth feel really clean after brushing. I have to say that I was initially skeptical, but have come to really like the way this brush operates.

I'm generally not a big fan of portable chargers. While they are small and can be easily transported, most won't fully charge my iPhone or Kindle tablets. The closest I've come has been a uNu battery. I was given a sample in exchange for an unbiased review. That being said, this little battery is small, light, easy to hold and transport. It comes with a small, very short cable and a nice carry pouch. The battery only takes a few hours to charge, since it has no power button you have to rely on the lights. I tested this on my Kindle HDX 7" starting at a 35% power level. The battery got it up to 55% in a couple hours before the red light kicked on. The battery was also very hot. I was not impressed. While it did charge faster, it didn't make much of a difference in total charging. Please note that if you want to use this for an iPhone, you will need a case with a micro USB port. The Aukey cable is not lightning compatible. I also tested it with my iPhone in a case with a micro USB port to roughly the same outcome. This is is an ok battery. It's small and portable and not reliable enough for me to recommend it.

I haven't been a big fan of new bulbs since many are so expensive and I was used to my 100 watt lamp and bulb. When it finally wore out and I had to purchase a new lamp, I was not looking forward to navigating the new bulb options. LEDs were not on my list. I was offered a free sample to test in exchange for an honest review. Despite that, I have no problems giving low marks to products that don't work well. Not so here! This LED comes beautifully packaged in a colorful box that gives you information on the wattage and light options. This nice plastic bulb burns cooler and produces wonderful bright daylight light and is RoHS compliant. This is a great bulb at a very affordable value and I would buy this again. The bulbs have a one year warranty. Great product for a great price and will help lower your electric bill.

This set of black carry bags are indeed premium. All five are soft, yet large enough for larger headphones. Some "premium" headphones don't come with carrying bags, so these are great to keep handy. I have a set of Panasonic Bluetooth headphones that didn't have a carrying case and they fit perfectly. There is enough room to fully close the bag with the ties. The inside is soft and won't damage delicate parts. A great value, very pleased with this purchase.

This candle set arrived securely packaged to ensure no damage to the glass candles. They are very full and burn evenly. They are long lasting and high quality. Much better than similar ones in several stores. I've purchased a backup set as well. Great product and fast service from the seller.

The AmazonBasics charging cable is a nicely made Apple compatible lighting product. It is similar in color and style to the original Apple cable, with the AmazonBasics logo on the lightning end. One of the best features is the very long 6 foot length of the cable. Apple's is great, but not long enough. I have a Belkin Apple certified charging cable I use most often, since it is a nice balance in length. The AmazonBasics cable is a bit too long, and you should be careful to keep it partially coiled to prevent tripping, if it close to the floor. While it charges well, it does not charge as quickly as the Apple original or the Belkin product. This is a great product if your ports are far apart and a great lower cost alternative. Just be sure to allow for extra charging time.

The Apple Watch stand is a beautiful, elegantly designed product. It mimics Apple's minimalist style of form and functionality. Even the box looks like an Apple design. (Apple is now requiring vendors to copy their design for products being displayed in Apple stores) The package contains the base stand watch holder, four silicone screws and an insert with three step instructions. Putting it together was relatively easy, as the stand slides into the base smoothly. The aluminum alloy looks nice and is sturdy. While I don't have an Apple Watch yet, the stand works for a digital watch I use. The silicone cup protects the bottom of the watch. The notch on the base stand will hold a phone by itself, not with a case unfortunately. It does hold my phone at portrait or landscape orientation, both comfortable viewing angles. This stand is primarily for holding and charging your Apple Watch, though it does hold an iPhone or IPad without cases. A great product, well made, both beautiful and functional.Full disclosure, I was provided with a free sample in return for an honest review.

At last, a new collection of Bigfoot tales from the master, Rusty Wilson. Sit back, relax and be very glad you aren't anywhere near the boonies in Alaska! This is a great collection of stories of Bigfoot encounters set in the largest state. Bigfoot lovers know that while they are found in all U.S. states except Hawaii, the ones in Alaska tend to have a fierce reputation, more so than the ones in the lower 48. This collection will definitely keep you hooked. I read the book in one sitting, it was engrossing. No spoilers here, but suffice it to say, most of the folks whose wonderful tales are shared left Alaska. There are many tales where you will will say OMG, and have to reread a passage again. As always, the tales are told with love and respect and you may not want to read this at night with the lights off. The Alaskan Bigfoot Campfire Stories is the latest in the Bigfoot Campfire series. If you enjoy this book, and you will, check out the other books in the series. They are all equally fantastic, well written and much more interaction than someone who saw a figure on a highway, for better or worse. I have them all and they are all great even after multiple reads.  Must reads include, "The Hairy Trio of Bigfoot Stories" and the excellent, "Ten Intense Bigfoot Campfire Stories." They are all highly addictive. Don't forget to check out Rusty's blog and say hi, he loves to hear from fans.

I received the white set of Trainer headphones. These are beautiful looking headphones. I've received a number of compliments from friends and coworkers while wearing them. Getting them out of the box was a hassle. They look fantastic in the packaging, but whoever designed them should be fired. There were screws on the box that had to be removed before you could even separate the outer shell and you have to remove a number of times to remove the headphones. They are a slightly sung fit and if you wear glasses, you will have to adjust them. The top section's inside padding is minimal. Since these are over the ear, you will hear outside sound and others close by may hear what you are listening to. The foldout Aeroflex does hold the headphones still and they don't move around. It is really great to be able to workout without wires. I do treadmill and strength training and I am able to move freely. The sound is also incredible, rich, full sound whether I'm listening to music, audiobooks or a movie. The night light is a nice feature, though I rarely go out at night. The waterproof feature is excellent for workouts, since they do cool down. The removable ear cups cannot be washed in a washing machine, they must be brainwashed and air dried. I don't wear them for long periods, I'm not a runner, but I would say that they would become uncomfortable after a longer period. Call quality is great, I can hear callers and the can hear me with few problems. They pair easily with my iPhone. The controls on the headphones are way too small and not intuitive. You really have to study the quick start guide to figure out how to use them. It is also difficult to use the buttons while wearing the headphones. I use the controls on my iPhone, since it's easier. A nice white cloth carrying bag is included to carry them. The charging port is sealed and can be hard to open, since it is small. Charging the headset takes a few hours. A light will go out when charging is complete. Other than the ridiculous packaging, this is a good first effort. More padding, larger buttons and softer ear cups would really help. If you purchase direct from Gibson, they have a payment plan. The Gibson Trainer headphones are great for active workouts for shorter periods.

The Apple Watch stand is a beautiful, elegantly designed product. It mimics Apple's minimalist style of form and functionality. Even the box looks like an Apple design. (Apple is now requiring vendors to copy their design for products being displayed in Apple stores) The package contains the base stand watch holder, four silicone screws and an insert with three step instructions. Putting it together was relatively easy, as the stand slides into the base smoothly. The aluminum alloy looks nice and is sturdy. While I don't have an Apple Watch yet, the stand works for a digital watch I use. The silicone cup protects the bottom of the watch. The notch on the base stand will hold a phone by itself, not with a case unfortunately. It does hold my phone at portrait or landscape orientation, both comfortable viewing angles. This stand is primarily for holding and charging your Apple Watch, though it does hold an iPhone or IPad without cases. A great product, well made, both beautiful and functional.Full disclosure, I was provided with a free sample in return for an honest review.

This belt was purchased for a friend. He is very pleased with the item. He says it is easy to adjust, though you might have to squeeze the buckle through loops in pants. The fit is very comfortable, and the coloring and style look great. It is sturdy and well made. A great item for fans of the show.

I wound up ordering these cloths by accident. I was looking for a Prime Day deal and wound up purchasing these. The MagicFiber cloths are individually packaged and work much better than I expected. I use them for cleaning my glasses. Lens coatings on polycarbonate lenses smudge so easily and I had tried numerous cloths. They cut smudges without needing sprays or liquids extremely well. The only disappointment for me is the fact that they aren't recommended to be machine washed and you can't use detergent. Otherwise, they are fabulous.

This is an elegant and beautiful case for an iPhone 5 or 5S. The leather like material is soft and very comfortable to hold in your hand. It also makes it easier to hold in one hand while you work your phone with the other. I love the magnetic close flap, you don't have to fight with a button. The case comes with an cleaning cloth, front and back screen protectors and a stylus. The stylus works very well, a light touch easily opens apps. The plastic case holds your phone securely and it may take some fidgiting to get it out. The several pockets included can hold credit or debit cards and the case folds to use as a stand. I find it particularly useful for gym visits. I can carry this case and my membership card without needing a purse. I really love the light blue color. The case is elegantly packaged in a beautiful gray box. The product, presentation, packaging and service are all first rate. Urban obviously cares about quality and their customers.Full disclosure, I was provided with a sample in exchange for an honest review.

The Panasonic RP-BTD10-K headphones are a nice looking set. They are black with an adjustable (up & down) feature and soft cushioned ear pads. They are very comfortable to wear. Out of the box, the set includes the headphones, a charging cable and a cord cable to plug into your device if you don't want to go wireless and an owner's manual. That's it. For $200, you don't even get a carrying case. The box is minimalist. The set does not come fully charged. Fortunately, this set charges quickly, taking about 4.5 hours to fully charge. That is a big plus. The manual wants you to charge this using your computer, but I have no problems charging with an adapter. The unit cannot be on when charging, and the LED button glows red while charging and turns off when fully charged. I do like this, as it is easy to tell when charging is done. The left side ear cup contains the wired plug in port, LED On/OFF button and a covered port for charging and a reset button. The out side of the ear cup has a raised icon in the center for making or answering calls. The raised icon at the bottom is for pairing NFC with Android phones. The right side ear cup has raised icons for volume and playback controls. They are nicely spaced out so they won't easily be confused. The first-time turn on will cause the LED to blink both red and blue while searching for a device to connect to. Depending upon the device, you may have to enter a code or select a profile. I was able to connect using the headphone name on my iPhone. Pairing is not as easy as it should be. It took several attempts for first time pairing. The unit beeps when some functions are performed, but the volume is low you can barely hear it. There is no audible confirmation of status. My Turtle Beach i30 headset has audible confirmations, which I love. The sound quality is good, not much base and you really have to turn the volume up to hear. I don't play loud music to protect my hearing, but I do have to turn this unit up more to hear music. Call quality is great. The microphone carries my voice clearly and I can hear callers easily. You can listen to music about 30 hours before charging. This is a good effort that could've been better. While they are compact and comfortable, my Turtle Beach headphones are a much classier act with seamless pairing, better base and audible confirmations. They cost comparably to these, are beautifully packaged and come with everything you need. The Panasonic headset is great for calls, just ok for music.PROSVery comfortable to wearEar pads swivel, and have soft cushioningShort charging time, 4.5 hours, easy to tell when completeGreat call qualityRaised buttons, east to feel and useLong listening time between charges, about 30 hoursLightweight, easy to carryCONSUnit volume tends to be low, not much baseNo carrying cloth (for this price, it should've been included)Cover flap for charging port is flimsyHeadphones feel a bit cheapNo carrying case includedPairing takes a bit longer, tends to be hit or miss

This is the second book recounting the author's experiences with an active habitation site. Ms. George has followed her first book with the latest happenings on her property. I enjoyed her first book and enjoyed this one as well. The first book recounted her discovery of what was in the woods near her home and the foundation of a group to further explore the surroundings. The second book covers more experiences, some quite frightening, that both the family and the group created to investigate these sightings had. The group is called the Carolina Cryptid Crew and you can view photos, videos and more on their website (search for Carolina Cryptid Crew), YouTube and Facebook. If you have read up on Sasquatch, you will recognize a good deal of the behaviors exhibited. The author also gives an honest assessment of the hazards and risks of Cryptid research. It can be dangerous. There are many accounts of expeditions into the woods and the Squatches are not happy about it. While Ms. George does take care, this should be a cautionary tale to respect nature. She also includes many accounts of encounters at the end and provides lots of Links to her sites. Like the first book, this is a compelling account of encounters. I eagerly await the further adventures of Ms. George and the Crew.

I frequently buy New Balance shoes because they make a wide selection of shoes in a wide width. This pair is very well made, sturdy, yet very comfortable. I wear these to work and they are fantastic. Easy on Velcro straps that adjust are better for me than laces.  Very comfortable foot bed. I really love the sturdy support. While they are not designed as orthopedic, they are a cost effective alternative. They help maintain a good balance. New Balance is the lone shoe maker that commits to manufacturing their products here in the US. A great many shoe manufacturers don't make larger size or wider width shoes. You can count on New Balance to have your size and wide width options available. I love the fact that they make shoes for nearly everyone, not just a select few.

Very short book with little information. Just a few pages (not even full pages) of some standard info, trivia and links to videos. Not worth your time or funds. Search Wikipedia and you will learn more.

Engrossing account of a purported Bigfoot attack. I generally prefer real accounts of encounters or documentary books on Bigfoot, so initially, I thought that this was a true story. At the very end of the book, a notation in small print stated that this was a work of fiction. That was disappointing. It should've been noted up front that this was a work of fiction.That being said, it is a very good story, with a lot of bad language. I mention this for readers who may not care for that. The story concerns efforts to find the perpetrator of several attacks at a campground site. I won't give away theme rest, as it should be discovered. This book is an engrossing tale and very realistic and enjoyable. I give it four stars, one deducted due to the fact that it is a work of fiction and not a real account. I probably would not have read it, had I known it was fiction.

The new TheraBreath Soothing Oral Rinse is indeed soothing. It has Aloe, Chamomile, Xylitol and Oatmeal extract among other ingredients. It has a very pleasant taste and your gums will feel refreshed. That being said, it was designed to help reduce stains and slight discomfort. It is Not designed to reduce plaque or bacteria, nor will it help with sore gums. While it is a good product and does soothe the gums, you will need to look elsewhere if you are having gum issues. This is a somewhat pricey product for something that doesn't do much. Sore gums are generally caused by bacteria or plaque and require a dentist's care. A good herbal Oral Rinse like Jason's Healthy  Mouth or mouthwash that reduce plaque and bacteria or gingivitis would be a better option (without alcohol). If you don't have major gum issues, this is good product, with good ingredients. Still a bit costly.

This book is an insider's account of several BFRO expeditions that took place in Canada. For those interested in how the BFRO conducts expeditions and what type of personnel and attributes are required, this will be an interesting read. Some prior reviewers have noted that they found this book to be boring. If you would like stories of Squatch encounters, there are a number of books available, most notably, Rusty Wilson's Bigfoot Campfire Stories. All editions are great. Blaine McMillan is giving readers the real nuts and bolts of what Squatch searching is all about. It is often not glamorous, can be tedious and thrilling on a moment's notice. The BFRO, founded by Matt Moneymaker of "Finding Bigfoot", is a serious organization dedicated to learning about Sasquatch. They approach the subject as real and do not intend to harm them. Their focus is learning about the species. This book tells the reader a great deal about many of the behaviors mentioned on the show. BFRO members often conduct a great of background work, interviewing witnesses, gathering evidence and helping to set up town hall meetings for the show. It is this methodical research that gives insight to this elusive creature. Besides recounting several expeditions, he also gives excellent advice on how to prepare and what to do if you would like to join an expedition. A limited number of outings are open to the public after a screening process. Membership is by invitation only, this being done to weed out undesirables. While there are other groups, (research styles are often a hot topic in the Bigfoot community), the BFRO is the oldest organization investigating Bigfoot and they take the subject seriously and treat witnesses with respect. Investigators like Blaine are the backbone of Bigfoot research and much of what we know comes from their dedicated effort. There is also some great history of Bigfoot research and researchers included, along with several interesting hypothesis and footnotes with info, should you wish to delve further. A great book for serious Bigfoot fans and for the novice who wants to know what really happens in the field. I hope he publishes more tales.

Wonderful collection of laundry bags in various sizes. The bags are sturdy, yet allow clothing to get clean and dry. There is a unique flap (you can see it in the photo) that you push the zipper through that keeps the contents from spilling out. You must push the zipper through the expandable flap before you put your bag in the laundry or the bag will open and your items will spill out. If the zipper is tucked into the flap (gently push it through to come out the other side) your items will stay secure. Use the right amount of items per bag size for effective cleaning and drying. This is a great value and a great way to secure loose items that can be lost like socks.

This Adidas bag is a large, roomy sports bag that is great for taking clothing and gear. There is a large main compartment and two zippered side compartments. The bag has a removable, cushioned strap for carrying and a larger shoulder strap that is also removable. While the duffel bag is a nice comfortable size (it looks more like a medium size bag than a small one),  it is notable for what it lacks. The main compartment has a double zipper opening, with a tiny inside zippered pocket. It should've been a lot larger. I have a Champion upright tote style bag that I use for a gym bag and it has many large pockets, zipper enclosures and two nice deep pockets on the inside to fit a variety of items, including a water bottle. The Adidas bag does not. There is a mesh style on one side of the bag that looks like it is a pocket, but it's not. The bottom is nice and sturdy and it is very easy to carry. For a "small" bag it does hold a lot of items. A change of clothing and shoes fit with plenty of room to spare, but the lack of pockets is a glaring omission. I like to have a place to carry extra headphones and my phone. Not in this bag. Otherwise, a great, roomy bag.

This is a beautiful, laminated, full color prayer card for Saint Expedite. The front features a gorgeous rendering of the Saint, with a special prayer on the back. It was blessed by His Holiness, Pope Francis. A lovely, full color card written in Latin with a picture of the Pope gives a short prayer and the date it was blessed. While I don't read a great deal of Latin, I was able to make out the blessing of the Cross and the date the card was blessed. Both are enclosed in a plastic pouch for protection. Exquisite!

This is the first of a set of books about Bigfoot encounters in West Virginia. Unlike many encounter books, this author does not delve into research or theory. The reader is given some background on the author and the subject and then gets down to business. There is a great collection of encounters, many of which are from non-believers who saw the big guy. If you enjoy books of encounter tales, then you will enjoy this one. This book is aimed at the casual reader who doesn't know a great deal about Bigfoot lore or behavior.

This a highly accurate, easy to use blood pressure monitor. Omron is a leader in medical monitoring devices and they make quality products. I previously had a Panasonic monitor that did not work as well as the Omron. First, the Omron comes with a cuff large enough to fit larger arms. With the Panasonic, the larger cuffs had to be special ordered. Instructions and set up are easy, I set the date and time in minutes and was up and running in less than 10 minutes. Place the cuff on your arm above the elbow with the tube facing away (there are illustrations to show proper placement), extend your arm and don't move while the cuff inflates. It will give you your Systolic, Diastolic and heartbeat readings in a few fast minutes. While this model doesn't have Bluetooth compatibility, there are some great free and low cost apps that will allow you to track your readings over time. This device will remember about 40 readings, but I use a mobile app instead. The numbers are nice and large and very easy to read. Batteries come with the device, but don't last too long, especially if you are taking a lot of readings. A great mid-priced option to monitor your blood pressure.

The QuikVolt Dual Port USB Car Charger is a must have for your car. Some cases for cell phones can be bulky and this is a great alternative option to have in your car. It is lightweight and easy to use. It will glow green to show it is charging. There are two color coded sides to charge different devices. The white port is a 1.0 AMP port to charge a phone, while they other black side is a 2.1 AMP port to charge a tablet. Simply plug in the QuikVolt charger, verify that the green light is lit, then connect your USB cable to your device and charge while you drive. It does provide a relatively fast charge (depending on how low your battery is) and can free you from carrying cords around. Just keep a QuikVolt and charging cable in your car and you are good to go. Great little device!

This was a great story of an encounter. The author is a very experienced woodsman with extensive experience in the wild from a young age. I always enjoy tales where people who have a great deal of experience in the wild learn that there are indeed things in the woods they didn't expect. The author tells of his many forays into the woods and his obvious love of nature. Despite that he has an early encounter he isn't quite sure about and doesn't take his father's advice to not return to that section of woods. He later doesn't take his own advice and finally learns that we are not the top of the chain in the wild. A great book and I hope that Mr. Connelly will write more books about his experiences.

This little book is a great collection of Bigfoot encounters. The author is a writer, who has collected a number of encounters, most first hand, that she and the people involved have been kind enough to share with us. I really enjoyed this book. Ms Cook has written for publications and collected encounter tales for a number of years. She has collaborated with well known researchers and is knowledgeable regarding the Native American lore of Bigfoot. This book is written for those who believe in Bigfoot, and is not a documentary or an attempt to persuade non believers. It is a great first effort and the stories are interesting, and she treats the participants with respect. I look forward to future books.

This is the first book I have seen dedicated to the mysterious Goatman. I had first learned about several versions of this legend on Destination America's Monsters and Mysteries in America, one of my favorite shows. Author Couch presents an exhaustively researched guide to the varying versions of the legend in several states. This work is a well balanced approach between speculation, critical review and folklore. Encounters stories are presented and critiqued. Sources are quoted and many links to websites, referenced books, articles and films are included for the reader to review on their own. The author also debunks some sites purporting to be real. This is an excellent documentary style read from a researcher who is both intrigued, yet skeptical of the subject matter. An interesting read.

This is another collection of mysterious disappearances in the woods. Author Young has crafted a well researched tome of weird happenings in the woods around the world. Many of these tales are new, some have been covered in his previous books. If you enjoy weird and mysterious tales then you will enjoy this book. He has a growing catalog of creepy tales in various categories. While I have read several of his books relating to the woods, they don't cover many Bigfoot encounters, which I enjoy reading about. I do recommend his books, they are well written and researched.

This is a great little book about one woman's contact with a Sasquatch family. It starts with an overview and gets right to the action. Contact turns into a habitation site. She has a very active clan. While the author is more aware than many of what she has encountered, she has not set up a website or given any contact information. I have read many books on encounters with Sasquatch, some of the contact she has experienced concerns me. I won't give that away here, but it is somewhat comforting that it is a family group and not singles near her. What she has imparted does make me fear for her safety. I hope she will keep in contact with friends, relatives and researchers. Even more, she should move.

Another creepy collection of creatures in the woods. Author Stephen Young has published several books of extensively researched stories regarding creatures and the paranormal. This latest collection is a series of strange encounters with things found in the woods from around the world. Some are tales of familiar creatures and others are new. I have read several of Mr. Youth's books and this one maintains the standard of a shorter, fun, creepy read. Worth your time.

This book is a collection of strange tales in the woods. It is not to be mistaken with another collection of strange tales in the woods by author Steve Young. This set is a very tame series of very short tales. While they may be considered strange, most are short recollections related to the woods. I didn't find them unusual or very strange. Most were simply too short to really get into. The Strange Woods series of books by Steve Young is a far better series of tales that are much spookier. This is okay for a quick read.

This book is a collection of stories and encounters with cryptid by an author who works in the field. There are a number of tales I am aware of and a few I hadn't heard. While there is some background given and stories of encounters told, the author also attempts to inject some humor as well. This is an uneven approach, sometimes serious, sometimes lighthearted with grammatical errors. While sometimes informative, it does not go as in-depth as other books have. If you are a fan of Monsters and Mysteries in America, you will recognize several of the tales told here and the author was featured in an episode. The chapters are short and it is a fast read. It left me wanting more. I didn't find many spooky either.

I was very sad to learn that the annual Sydney Omarr guides were no longer being published. There are a great many guides of varying quality available and many don't have the information that the Syndey Omarr guides had. This Horoscope Guide is the best I have seen of the many I have sampled. I prefer information regarding planetary transits relating to signs and monthly overviews, not necessarily day by day. This guide gives major transit information for the major planets, monthly overviews, a few celebrity charts and Sun sign pairings. It has an informative approach, giving you information you can use as a guide for planning, rather than deep explanations and love guides so many other books spend so much time on. You will see overviews for love, money and career, but with some great common sense tips. This strikes (for me) a perfect balance of planetary transits with dates and chart emphasis with monthly guides. Key word being "guide" not unrealistic forecasts that many other books are fond of using. The Horoscope 2015 is available for each sign and in a combined guide for all signs. A well done effort to fill a void left by the loss of the Sydney Omarr guides.

I have worn several different bra liners from different manufacturers and this set is the best I have ever used. The liners are larger, soft, comfortable and hold moisture at bay. Not only are they comfortable, but they stay put! Other liners I have worn were short and small and would frequently come loose and fall out. These stay put and I often forget I am wearing them. Love, love, love these liners. I will be ordering from Curvy Corner again, they make a great product. It is easy care washable as well.

This is my second Fintie cover I have purchased, I have one for my older 8.9 Kindle HD, it still protects it well. This new cover has a nice, colorful outer side and a black colored inner side.There is a cradled section that holds the device securely.
