Unlike the larger version of this case, there are no cutouts for the device buttons, so you have to constantly take it out of the secured section to reach the buttons, camera, on off button and volume rocker. You can fold the cover to act as a stand and the cover folds over to give solid support. I give it four stars with one off due to the lack of cutouts. Good, solid cover that protects your Kindle well. Easy to wipe clean also.

I purchase these every year to hold check stubs. The Globe-Weis product is one of the best. It is sturdy, well made and holds paperwork securely. It is expandable, comes with sturdy cardboard inserts with month and number inserts that easily slip into the tabbed headers. It comes with 13 pockets and a rubberized band that easily surrounds the file. With so many office supply places closing, it gets harder to find these in stores. Much better than the cheaper quality imitation file holders in the few stores that still carry them.

This threaded is fantastic. Simple, well designed and easy to use. Simply put one end of the drawstring into the catch loop and push the other larger rounded end through one hole and gently push until you reach the other end. This is a life saver!  I have workout pants that unfortunately are only available with drawstring and two pairs had lost them. I didn't want to buy new pairs so I decided to order this item. It took less than five minutes to add the string back. What a great item. I love the ease of use. If you have drawstring items, you need this. Highly recommended.

This is a collection of four books in one set. The set covers the marriages of the Queen and Prince Philip, Charles and Diana, Charles and Camilla and Prince William and Catherine. Each book was interesting, offering many juicy tidbits about palace intrigue and offering insights into the subjects. Despite the title, this book does present a realistic portrait of the couples, including friction and love triangles. I had read quite a bit about some and I found this set to be very informative. I learned quite a bit about each couple. For me the most interesting books were those about Prince Charles and Diana and Charles and Camilla. An example, Diana was deeply disturbed about Charles and Camilla and even wanted to back out of the wedding. The author takes a fair and balanced approach, not bashing anyone. If you are interested in the lives of Britain's Royal Family, you will enjoy this book. It was an eye opener and interesting reading.

The story of Charles and Camilla is truly a love story. They were evenly matched and she was the only person besides the late Louis Mountbatten that really understood and supported him. While many of us thought we knew Diana's side of the story, her marriage was engineered to keep the monarchy going. Having known more about Diana's upbringing and early life, I wanted to learn about Camilla's. She had a warm and loving family, and while not the most beautiful, she had a great personality that endeared her to many in her younger days. It was rather sad to learn the depth of loneliness in Charles' upbringing and Camilla was really his strength. If you have an open mind, (many still can't forgive Camilla for the breakup of Charles and Diana's marriage, the age difference and Diana's stellar personality, along with little common ground had really doomed it from the start) this is a fascinating story about a very brave woman who has endured a great deal of difficulty with grace for the man she loves. It is also an eye opener for what was really going on behind the scenes. Found this hard to put down.

This was a profoundly interesting book regarding the lives of Charles and Diana with insight into Camilla as well. It is a fair and balanced book, that does not sugarcoat the events, but gives details of what really happened in the marriage of Charles and Diana. A must read for royal watchers and fans, it is worthy of the best-selling title on Amazon. A great book

This is the continuing story of a family habituation encounter. There are many chilling details in this book and the boldness of the clan is amazing. The author's entire family is active in documenting and it has to be difficult for them. You will really feel the heartache, fear and loneliness of having to endure the harassment. I hope they are able to move. It is very rare to learn about this level of activity in a neighborhood. This is a fascinating read that will be difficult to put down. There is a great deal of action and links to audio and video on their website. If you enjoyed the first book, you will love this one. I can't wait to learn what happens next.

Just received these in the mail. As a Prime member it arrived just on time (2 days). Package was well and I got 2 pairs (one cat & other bunny) as expected. I am 5'3, 123 pounds. The fit is nice and snug, It may take some stretching out to do but not much if you like your stocking skin tight. (which I do) The colors are as pictured. The stockings have a slight shimmer to them. The black is very black and the nude is very nude.The white face's of the animals are visible as well, and stops right at the knees. It looks perfect with a pair of shorts or a short skirt. I plan on buying many more of these styles, I love it! Must buy!.I am very impressed with the price in comparison to many other companies. I would deff recommend this to my family and friends. I was given the opportunity to try this product at a discount and give my honest. I received no other compensation for my review and always give my honest opinion of each product.

I love this phone case! It looks better than the picture shown here. I have the iPhone 6 Plus in gold and this clear case w/ sparkles makes it look great! It shows the gold and the apple a little more than the picture shows. I was afraid that the case might make my phone feel too big and thick, but it doesn't at all! Still feels comfortable holding it w/ one hand.I love the gold buttons on the sides, makes it easier to press the up/down and sleep buttons (I tried the Apple leather case on my phone in store and those integrated buttons were HARD to push!) It covers well enough so that if my phone is face down, the screen doesn't touch the table/surface, and on the back side the camera wouldn't touch the table/surface.I bought this at a different store online and chose in store pick up, so I had a flat rate of 34.99, no shipping and got it same day!Love, love, love this case! Just need to get a screen protector now.I am very impressed with the price in comparison to many other companies. I would deff recommend this to my family and friends. I was given the opportunity to try this product at a discount and give my honest. I received no other compensation for my review and always give my honest opinion of each product.

0:45 MinsThis bus is full of disco rainbow magic. I laughed when I first turned it on because it is such an energetic and flashy toy. The detailing from paint job to little seats and bus mirrors are all there and makes this bus a nice and realistic looking toy. Then you turn the off switch to on and you've got a bump and go toy. Along with the roll around regular wheels there is a set of spinning wheels underneath that make is so the bus can go on it's own and turn around by itself when it runs into a wall. The head lights come on as regular lights and inside of the bus has flashing and color changing lights that flash to the music. I like that there are side windows and sunroof panels so you can really see the light show. The music is upbeat and quite loud. I did find it a bit redundant as it repeats the same two almost incoherent lines in a loop but it still made us laugh because it's so peppy. I would have expected something like "The wheels on the bus" and it's definitely more energetic than that. My sister and I were taking guesses at what the bus was singing and my guess on the first line is "Far away from Dixie Town" for the second line I thought I made out the words "family magazine" but I'm not all that sure. Most parents aren't really fans of loud noise making toys but kids certainly love them. We had fun making a game of guessing the lyrics so it made the noise much more tolerable than other toys we've had in the past. I do wish the bus had an option to run the lights with out the music though for times we'd prefer quiet play. Other than that this is a cute toy that kids will love. .I am very impressed with the price in comparison to many other companies. I would deff recommend this to my family and friends. I was given the opportunity to try this product at a discount and give my honest. I received no other compensation for my review and always give my honest opinion of each product.

The directions are simple - take 1 capsule twice a day. The capsules are standard size and easy to swallow. I took each capsule with a cup of water. Once I forgot and I burped up a cloud of dust and it doesn't taste that great. I followed the directions and after almost 10 days, I was able to notice I was not as hungry so I was able to eat smaller portions. I also noticed that my rings and jeans seemed to fit just a little bit more normal versus tight. This product really does help to curb your appetite. I am excited to continue to take this supplement as I plug on with this weight loss and healthy journey.I am very impressed with the price in comparison to many other companies. I would deff recommend this to my family and friends. I was given the opportunity to try this product at a discount and give my honest. I absolutely love this serum. I use a pea size amount on my face after the serum on  my skin feels great. If you use too much, your skin can be a little oily but just the right amount leaves your skin feeling amazing. Will continue to purchase and use both. Great brand! I have dry and sensitive skin. I recently had a chemical peel where I incurred some damage. The hyaluronic acid keeps the area that was chemically burned, moist and supple. I actually found a study which indicated, hyaluronic acid sped up the healing time, on a puncture wound. While my injury is more like a scrape, the hyaluronic acid has helped tremendously.. I love facial care products but too many of them are just junk...that can't be said about this stuff! It's silky and lightweight, and it really turbocharges my moisturizer! I like it, quite a lot...I am very impressed with the price in comparison to many other companies. I would deff recommend this to my family and friends. It took a little time to sink in while rubbing, just make sure you don't use too much. It comes in a plastic jar, no pump, which while it's messier than other roll ons, you have to rub it in anyway so putting your fingers in the container isn't that much more. It works in soothing out the pain in my shoulders, neck and back, plus works on arthritis. The smell is Great  I applied it two to three times a day, depending on the pain levels. It is similar to using Icy Hot except it doesn't get hot.I am very impressed with the price in comparison to many other companies. I would deff recommend this to my family and friends. I tend to gravitate towards darker coffees with a deep "coffee" flavor rather than any of that light, medium, or fancy flavored stuff. I like my coffee to taste like coffee and I want it to be strong enough that I still get a full bodied coffee flavor after adding a little cream and sweetener.But I hate coffee with a bitter taste and acidic aftertaste, which is where most coffees go once they get in the bold flavor range. This coffee promised to be medium range so I had decided I would have one cup and likely pass it off to my teenage son or husband...after tasting it I am keeping it for myself :) This one, wowed me! It is a very deep and complex coffee, full of bold flavor but completely void of bitterness or acidity..I am very impressed with the price in comparison to many other companies. This stand is a bit of an oddity in my opinion. Basically, its a large magnifying glass. Definitely as good as my "Name Brand' fiber lash mascara. It is easy to apply, and comes with directions if you haven't used them before. You put on regular mascara, then use the long tube, then use the short tube with the fibers. I really liked that it came with an extra brush to separate the lashes and give it a more natural look.WOW! This product is amazing. I have never used 3D fiber Mascara before, so I did not know what I was missing out on. This stuff looks like I wear false lashes all the time with out actually wearing false lashes. I am always getting compliments on my lashes now and being asked what kind of lashes I have been wearing! I tell them that it is 3D Fiber Mascara and everyone is shocked! It is really simple to apply. All you have to do is put on the transplanting gel and then quickly apply the fibers to it. I usually wait for about 10-15 seconds and then apply another coat of the transplanting gel to set the fibers in. It does say to put on a coat of your favorite mascara before doing this, but I like it either way. I dont always apply my mascara first. Sometimes I do not wear mascara at all. The results are amazing! It also comes with an extra eyelash wand so that you can run through your lashes after applying the fibers and transplanting gel to help separate them. When I first started using the 3D mascara, I noticed that the lashes were falling a bit and were irritating my eyes a little, BUT I found out I was not letting them set long enough before applying the transplanting gel to set them in. I was applying it immediately after applying the fibers. It is best to wait for 10-15 seconds to let them set before applying your next layer of transplanting gel. This 3D Mascara also came in a nice case. I love the way it looks and it would make a wonderful gift to someone who loves makeup in general and someone who spends time on there lashes to make them look great! There are two DIFFERENT types of almond oil, sweet almond oil and bitter almond oil. Bitter almond oil is darker, smells more like almonds, and is considered an essential oil. Sweet almond oil is a fixed oil, which is why it feels well- oily! Sweet almond oil will not smell like almonds, even though it comes from the tree that produces the types of almonds that we eat so ravenously. Also, sweet almond oil is considered an ALL PURPOSE face moisturizer (kind of similar to coconut oil where you can cook with it but also put it in your hair, but it doesn't smell like coconuts-thank goodness). Where as bitter almond oil is not a fixed oil but rather an essential oil (repeating myself for clarity) and it isn't used in any way for skin care! It doesn't even have any aromatherapy benefits! It simply smells good, and therefore it goes into things like almond soaps, lotion bars, and lip balms. People just assume that the darker sweeter smelling almond oil therefore has the benefits that sweet almond oil has. So- for those people questioning themselves buying this and thinking, "I don't want to rub veggie oil on my face! Plus it won't smell like anything!" please, calm down, take a deep breath and buy this. Seriously, do what I say and buy it right now. I use this in my body scrubs all the time, and when I say this I mean this specific brand! It's awesome!General Skin Care : As a skin aid, I use the Almond Oil on my dry skin, after my shower before toweling dry. This has worked very well to keep my dry skin softened in the hot summer desert climate.I am very impressed with the price in comparison to many other companies. I would deff recommend this to my family and friends. I was given the opportunity to try this product at a discount and give my honest. I discovered several years ago that Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed is the best all-purpose lawn seed to use.  My coworker, Michelle, is a fanatic about keeping her lawn pristine.  She also uses the Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed.  My parents also use it on their lawn and they live approximately five-hundred miles away from me.  I live in Chesapeake, Virginia, and they live in Maryville, Tennessee, which is a growing community outside of Knoxville.  It is a hop, skip and jump from Pigeon Forge and Gatlinburg.  My parents terrain is different from mine.  Their soil is probably more fertile than mine.  Mine is sandier since the beach is less than thirty miles away.  About three years ago I bought my condo.  Soon afterwards, I learned that the neighborhood children had been using my left side yard as a shortcut for walking to school in the mornings and afternoons.  That soon stopped when I erected a fence.  (A few hoodlums tried climbing over it.)  A large bare spot remained in my yard.  I took the advice of a professional employee at a lawn and garden center and covered it with Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed.  After a few months of faithful usage, the bare spot had beautiful grass growing on it.  Now I use it on my entire lawn, especially in the areas where it is difficult to grow grass such as in the shade of my larger trees.  Every time hurricane season approaches, I am tempted to cut them all down.  The grass seed is grainy like small rice pellets and dyed a bright baby blue.  It doesnt have any odor that I can detect and has never caused me to have an allergic reaction.  I often handle it with my bare hands.  The seed spreads easily when I use my Easy Hand-Held Broadcast Spreader.  The bags are re-sealable.  I prefer the largest bags because they seal much easier and are more cost effective.  Last week, I recently spread the seed after raking up all the leaves that had fallen in my yard.  I am currently visiting my parents for Thanksgiving and their lawn is one of the greenest in a neighborhood that is comprised mostly of doctors and lawyers.  My parents dont have a professional lawn care service.  They maintain their own lawn and rely heavily on Scotts.

I gave the Sapphire Oval Pendant Necklace from the Amazon collection to my girlfriend, Tammy, and she loved it.  I know the stones are lab created but they look genuine.  If Tammy hadnt already known that the necklace came from the Amazon Vine Program, she wouldve thought I had paid a small fortune for it at a renowned jewelry store.  The stones are dazzling.  Tammy couldnt wait to wear the necklace.  She has a hard time fastening it herself; I wish the clasp was larger.  I bought a twenty-four inch stainless steel chain on which to hang this Sapphire Oval Pendant and other pendants I have bought Tammy in the past.  Unfortunately, the Sapphire Oval Pendant wont readily come off the extremely slender, fragile chain upon which it is attached.  A jeweler can probably detach it and form a hook for hanging it on the twenty-four inch stainless steel chain.  Tammy needs a long chain in order to put it over her head rather than fastening it herself; her hands shake too much and Im not always there to fasten it for her.  Overall, the Sapphire Oval Pendant is gorgeous.  Tammy posted photos of the necklace on her FaceBook account and they went virile.  Many of her friends and relatives were impressed.  Some thought I had paid a fortune for it.  As I stated earlier, the stones are lab created but no one else needs to know.

I love deep-fried onion rings, but I was never able to prepare them until now.  Thanks to the Proctor Silex Professional Style Deep Fryer (Model No. 35041), I can enjoy restaurant-style onion rings, French fries and chicken tenders, but cleanup is anything but fast.  This deep fryer is advertised as a personal one.  It is great for meals that I prepare for my girlfriend, Tammy, and I.  Tammy loves crinkled fries and she really enjoyed the ones I deep fried with the deep fryer from Proctor Silex.  It is easy to assemble and use thanks to an easy-to-read, easy-to-follow instruction booklet.  Looking at its small size, one would think that it wouldnt hold much oil.  However, it will hold six cups of oil.  Never exceed the maximum level line of six cups.  The minimum level line is four cups.  Most oil is sold in forty-eight ounce bottles.  According to the booklet, vegetable oil is the best to use.  Most of my friends purchase Wesson all-purpose vegetable oil.  The oil can be reused around eleven times but it must be strained using paper towels or cheese cloth.  I used paper towels placed over a stainless steel colander placed on a stainless steel pot.  It did a fair job of straining the oil.  After straining, I used a funnel to pour the oil back into the same bottle in which it was bought.  I plan to purchase a metal container with a removable strainer such as the Cook N Home 1-1/2 Quart Stainless Steel Oil Storage Can (Cook N Home 1-1/2-Quart Stainless Oil Storage).  A coworker of mine, Karen, once owned a deep fryer with its own filter; unfortunately, the filter became permanently clogged and she threw the deep fryer away.  I have been using my Proctor Silex Deep Fryer for nearly a month and havent suffered any burns.  Grease fires and grease burns were a major concern of mine.  I always turn the dial to off and unplug it immediately after my portable kitchen timer begins loudly buzzing.  When cooking in the kitchen, I always wear an apron for protecting my skin and clothes.  I also wear an oven mitt when handling anything to do with the deep fryer, especially the lid and basket handles.  When lifting the lid, I keep the lid angled towards me so that hot steam is directed away from me.  After the deep fryer has heated to its proper temperature, as indicated by the illumination of both the green and red lights, I remove the lid and raise the basket clear of the oil before gently dropping the onion rings, French fries, chicken tenders, etc., into the basket and replacing it inside the deep fryer.  This Proctor Silex deep fryer has two safety features that I really like.  The best one is the magnetized cord that will become detached when it is pulled.  This will prevent children from pulling the deep fryer off the counter and horribly burning themselves.  Also, if the deep fryer overheats, it will automatically shut off; the owner will have to use the sharp point of a knife, pen, fork, etc., to push the red, recessed reset button located on the back of the machine.  (The deep fryer could overheat if the oil level doesnt reach the minimum line.)  I highly recommend the Proctor Silex Professional Style Deep Fryer (Model No. 35041) for the average American kitchen because it is small, economical, and easy to operate.  A built in filter and its own timer would have made it nicer.  Nevertheless, this deep fryer will make a great Christmas or wedding present for someone who loves to cook restaurant-style food.

Initially, I requested New Chapter Zyflamend Wholebody in order to relieve the soreness in my legs after walking at least thirty minutes each day.  However, I discovered that it eased the pain in my left hip that is caused by the ruptured disc in my lower back.  I take two gel capsules with food to prevent the New Chapter Zyflamend Wholebody from upsetting my stomach.  I have never experienced any detrimental side effects such as rashes and hives.  The ingredients consist of mostly natural herbs that people use in teas to treat various ailments such as colds and flu.  I was amazed at how well the New Chapter Zyflamend Wholebody works.  It is less expensive and more effective than the anti-inflammatory drugs that neurological surgeons have prescribed me; it is also less likely to cause liver and kidney damage that prescription drugs cause.  I highly recommend the New Chapter Zyflamend Wholebody.

For two weeks, Ive been taking the Advanced Double Strength Joint Soother Supplement from Vitamin World in lieu of my Triple Strength Osteo Bi-Flex Supplement.  Both have the three essential elements that my family doctor said I needed after I ruptured the disc in my lower back more than ten years ago:  Glucosamine, Chondroitin, and MSM.  Both the Joint Soother and the Osteo Bi-Flex have 1,500 mg of Glucosamine.  The Joint Soother has 1,193 mg of a Mobili-Flex Proprietary Blend which contains primarily Chondroitin and MSM.  The Osteo Bi-Flex contains 375 mg of a Joint Shield Proprietary Blend which also contains primarily Chondroitin and MSM.  In other words, the Joint Soother has much more Chondroitin and MSM than the Osteo Bi-Flex.  The Osteo Bi-Flex has always relieved the pain in my knees; however, several months ago, the bones in my fingers began aching painfully.  Fortunately, after two weeks of taking the Joint Soother, the pain has been greatly alleviated.  One dose of the Joint Soother is three caplets and one dose of the Osteo Bi-Flex is two caplets.  The caplets from both brands are approximately the same size.  It is recommended that they be taken at a meal.  I take the three tablets of the Joint Soother before going to bed at night and have not experienced any adverse reactions.  I highly recommend the Advanced Double Strength Joint Soother Supplement.  It may cost more but it is worth it for taking away the pain in my hands.  Now I have returned to speed typing.

The Zak! Designs Sippy Cup is a big success with my grandniece, Danielle, who lives with me.  Danielle is always knocking her cups over, but the sippy cup doesnt spill.  (She took a shine to the one with the green dinosaur.)  In fact, if it wasnt for the childish designs, I would use these sippy cups myself.  My travel mugs are not spill proof; with age, their lids are becoming more difficult to screw on.  What I liked the most about the Zak! Designs Sippy Cup is that my sister-in-law Judith (Danielles grandmother) can use it.  Judith has Parkinsons; her right hand constantly shakes.  Normally, she has her own weighted insulated cup that is designed especially for those with Parkinsons.  Judith forgot hers when she came to visit Danielle for a week.  She found the Zak! Designs Sippy Cup adorable and functional.  I tried giving it to her as a gift but she insisted I keep it for Danielle.  She prefers her weighted insulated cup but the Zak! Designs Sippy Cup was a suitable substitute.  I would never have known if she hadnt come for a visit.

I am a graduate of the University of Tennessee in Knoxville.  I grew up in the land of the U.T. Vols.  Our blood runs deep orange.  I found the Hefty College Cups to be great for parties, especially if you are a Volunteer.  However, they are not as durable as I thought they would be.  They are definitely not reusable; they are intended for one-time use.  I have plastic cups from fast-food restaurants that Ive used for years; they are made of hard plastic and have walls that are thicker than these Hefty cups.  The designs on these Tennessee Volunteer cups are appropriate; they are indelible; they dont fade during usage and rub off on my hands.  The cups are too small to hold 18 ounces without spillage.  Overall, they are nice novelty cups for social events.  They arrived in three plastic sleeves containing 28 cups each.  I kept one sleeve and gave the other two to coworkers who liked them.  We use them mostly for drinking sodas.

The BURBERRY Touch for Women Eau de Parfum arrived in a stylish box that was ready for presenting it as a gift.  The bottle itself is simple but elegant.  My girlfriend, Tammy, loved the fragrance.  I tried a dab on my own wrist and approved it.  Tammy enjoys a sweet, soft fruity fragrance that is subtle and not overpowering.  She loves to wear it everywhere she goes:  work, church, and gatherings with friends and relatives.  It sprays easily and is a fragrance that lasts a long time.  Normally, she wears Halston Perfume.  Now she plans to alternate between the two fragrances.  It would make a great Christmas, birthday or anniversary present.

Crescent has created a great tongue and groove plier set.  This plier set, and a couple of screwdrivers, is all I need for performing maintenance on my tractor or any of my other pieces of lawn equipment.  With the help of my nieces husband, Solomon, I recently installed a new trailer hitch on my tractor.  I learned that all three pliers in the set were perfect for every bolt and nut I had to install.  I found the insulated handles on the pliers to be very comfortable, no matter how much pressure I was forced to exert on them.  The jaws stay aligned at every position, from the smallest to the largest.  The handles remain at a comfortable gripping position, whatever positon of the jaw.  As far as the durability is concerned, I wont be using these pliers every day; therefore, they will probably outlast me.  I would highly recommend this set of Crescent pliers for anyone who doesnt want to carry a complete set of wrenches or sockets in his/her tool bag.

I love the 1001SL LED Lamp from SAFCO.  Ive used it on both the desk for my laptop computer and on my dining room table.  The desk for my laptop is very small.  There is barely enough room for my laptop and all its accessories (speakers, mouse, external hard drive, lamp, etc.).  The SAFCO lamp provides excellent lighting for when I am typing on my laptop.  Most of the time, however, I use the lamp on my dining room table where I do a majority of my reading.  (If I try reading in bed or in my lounge chair, I will probably fall asleep.)  The lamp is EXTREMELY flexible and I can always get the bright LED light close to my book.  I had to use a large screw driver to tighten the screw at the base so that it would lean over towards my novel without falling down.  I connected one end of the power cord into the back of the lamp and the other into a nearby wall socket.  While I am reading, I can charge my iPhone 5S by connecting it to a USB port in the back of the lamp.  This is very convenient.  Sometimes, when my girlfriend, Tammy, is travelling, she FaceTimes me late at night while I am reading.  I can charge the iPhone near me while I am reading and still be able to quickly answer it.  On the lamps base, there are seven buttons that can be used to dim the light and two buttons for changing the color temperature.  Honestly, I never use them.  I want the light to be very bright in order to prevent eye strain.  Also, the LED light never seems to get too hot to touch.  Overall, I am very happy with this extremely flexible light; it can be put anywhere on a cluttered table or desk and positioned in order to provide adequate light for reading.  This SAFCO LED lamp would make the perfect gift for anyone who reads a lot of books at a desk or table.

I made my girlfriend, Tammy, very happy when I gave her the 18k Yellow Gold Plated Sterling Silver Two-Tone Double Open Oval Pendant Necklace from the Amazon Collection.  It is beautiful, elegant, and very fashionable.  Tammy put it around her neck as soon as she got it out of the black satin box in which it arrived.  (The box was inside a Zip-lock-sealed plastic bag, which had been shipped to me inside a gray plastic bag lined with bubble wrap.)  With my iPhone 5S, I took photos of Tammy wearing it and close-up photos of the pendant itself.  Tammy posted the photos on her Facebook account; she received numerous positive feedback from friends and relatives.  They were very impressed.  I suppose they are expecting me to give her a ring for Christmas.  Some friends were rather disgruntled upon learning I had given her a new microwave oven for her birthday, but her old own had caught fire.  Upon closer inspection, I noticed that the pendants chain is extremely thin.  It appears as though it might easily break.  Tammy is contemplating buying a new chain from which to hang the pendant.  Furthermore, the chains clasp is a round one.  It is not the more secure crab-claw or lobster-claw clasp that I have on my expensive, pure-gold chains.  The pendant is beautifully designed and is of a size that can be clearly seen; however, it is not as large as what appears on Amazons website.  Neither is the diamond design as glamorous as what is depicted on the website.  On the website, the large pendant appears to be covered with rows of tiny, individual diamonds.  In actuality, the pendant has a diamond-cut surface; it sparkles but not as great as the one on the website.  Nevertheless, the pendant is a beautiful, elegant and fashionable piece of costume jewelry.  It would make an affordable birthday or Christmas present for someone special in your life.

My girlfriend, Tammy, thought that DJ the dinosaur puppet (from Manhattan Toys line of Baby Genius products) was simply adorable.  I was able to easily insert my arm inside the puppets neck and clamp down on its mouth.  There is a flat button in the roof of its mouth that causes DJ to speak when it is pressed.  There is no volume control; I wish he spoke louder.  However, I am able to operate the puppet without it speaking.  Therefore, I can put on my own one-puppet plays or sing along to various songs.  My niece, Gianna, who lives with me, has been using this puppet to entertain her two children, baby Danielle and three-year-old Antonio, before they go to bed.  She also thinks that the dinosaur is adorable.  Danielle goo-goos and Antonio just grins while DJ reads a bedtime story.  I think DJ pairs wonderfully with the What Do You Hear? soft activity book from Manhattan Toy (Baby Genius What Do You Hear Soft Activity Book with Sound for Infants by Manhattan Toy).  DJ, who likes to sing, appears on the cover of this book.

For years, Ive occasionally drunk the Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail (Clamato Original Tomato Cocktail, 32 fl oz bottles (Pack of 12)).  My general practitioner told me that tomatoes prevent prostate cancer.  I was fortunate to receive 32 ounce bottle of Clamato Preparado Tomato Cocktail from the Amazon Vine program.  The Preparado variety of Clamato tastes very spicy.  It definitely clears out my sinuses.  I drank four ounces of it before singing in the choir.  No more congestion.  The next morning, I poured a cup of ice cubes, approximately five to six ounces of the Clamato Preparado Tomato Cocktail, and an ounce of ABSOLUT vodka into a hurricane glass and stirred the contents with a celery stick.  It was a delicious concoction--spicy and relaxing.  I sipped it while reading M. C. Beatons latest Agatha Raisin mystery novel, Dishing the Dirt (Dishing the Dirt: An Agatha Raisin Mystery (Agatha Raisin Mysteries)).  The Clamato Preparado Tomato Cocktail reminds me of the Mr & Mrs T, Original Bloody Mary Mix (Mr & Mrs T, Original Bloody Mary Mix, 5.5 Ounce Cans (Pack of 4)).  The ingredients are similar.  Both are very spicy and both make excellent Bloody Marys.  Also, the Preparado makes an excellent marinade.  I cut up a pound of chicken breasts into tenders, sliced up a small green zucchini and a small yellow squash, and soaked them all for a day in a cup of Clamato Preparado Tomato Cocktail.  I poured the mixture, along with a one-half cup of olive oil, into my KitchenAid Cast Iron 3-Quart Casserole Cookware (KitchenAid KCLI30CRER Streamline Cast Iron 3-Quart Casserole Cookware - Empire Red) and baked at 400 degrees Fahrenheit for 45 minutes.  I served the chicken and vegetables over a bed of brown rice.  It was delicious.  I will definitely be buying more of the Clamato Preparado Tomato Cocktail because you can use it for preparing numerous delicious treats.

I gave the What Do You Hear? activity book from Baby Genius of Manhattan Toy to my good neighbors Cal and Marlene who live across the street from me.  They have two girls, Jackie, who is one-a-half years old, and Susan, who is three.  Marlene was excited about the book because she played drums in her high school band, which would explain the well-toned muscles in her arms.  Cal played the trumpet.  Marlene is hoping that the What Do You Hear? activity book will influence her two girls to play musical instruments.  According to Marlene, the youngest one, Jackie, laughs a lot while her dad, Cal, reads the book to her and presses the large musical note that is attached to the book via a red ribbon.  Unfortunately, the battery doesnt seem to be easily replaceable.  Therefore, this is not a toy that can be handed down from child to child or from generation to generation.  How long will the battery last?  I dont know.  In the meantime, Cal is having a good time using the book to play with Jackie.  Susan doesnt appear to be very interested in the book; perhaps Jackie is the more musically inclined among the sisters.  Nevertheless, the What Do You Hear? is a good teaching tool for young children; it will help them learn new sounds, especially those pertaining to music.  The book also has a mirror, and babies, Ive noticed, often stare at their reflections as though they are observing strangers.  (Our cats exhibit the same behavior.)  Unfortunately, without the ability to replace batteries, the book wont be around for a long time because it isnt as fun or educational without the music.

My girlfriend, Tammy, fell in love with the Tawashi Fish-Shaped Scrubbers from Now Designs.  She collects all things that pertain to the sea.  In fact, in North Carolinas Outer Banks, she recently opened up a small booth at an antique mall.  The booth is called Tammys Collectibles.  It sells nautical items, including fish made from all types of materials ranging from onyx to coral to marble.  Tammy refused to allow me to use the fish-shaped scrubbers for cleaning dirty dishes.  In all honesty, the scrubbers are very small and light-weight.  The Amazon Vine Program mailed them to me in a padded envelope.  At first, I thought the envelope was empty; I couldnt believe anything was in it.  I opened the envelope and found the pair of scrubbers.  The scrubbers were taped inside their own protective, transparent bag.  They appear to be crocheted by hand.  Almost immediately, Tammy took down a couple of inexpensive prints of lighthouses and hung the fish in their place.  This is fine with me since the fish-shaped scrubbers looked too delicate for actually cleaning dishes, glasses, cookware, etc.  They would look great hanging in a kitchen, especially a rustic one.  The fish-shaped scrubbers coordinate well with a pair of lemon yellow homespun dishcloths from Now Designs (Now Designs Homespun Dishcloths, Lemon Yellow, Set of 2), which I also reviewed for the Amazon Vine Program.  I recommend the fish-shaped scrubbers as gifts for the chef who likes nautical-themed decorations in their kitchen.

A former U.S. Marshall, Simon Fisk is now a PI who locates abducted children. However, for twelve years he could never find his own missing daughter, six-year-old Hailey, who was taken from his Georgetown home. The case has gone cold, until now. Former FBI analyst Kati Sheffield texts Simon the photo of a young woman wanted for murder in Dublin, Ireland. She could very well be a grown Hailey. As Simon travels across Europe in search of this elusive woman, he becomes involved with gangsters who try to kill him. He also uncovers bizarre family secrets and learns that the evilness behind Hailey's abduction was always closer than he had ever imagined.Douglas Corleone's "Gone Cold" is the third entry in the Simon Fisk series and is definitely the best one to date. Simon is all alone. He is no longer looking for other people's abducted children. He is concentrating all his time, money and effort into searching for his daughter, Hailey. The reader can feel Simon's torment. He gets drunk every night. Kati's text is a flash of hope. He rushes to Dublin where he meets some strange allies. Then he is off to Glasgow, Scotland, where he becomes involved in a gang war between the Gilchrist Clan and the Maxwell Clan. A lot of gun play ensues. Everywhere he goes in Europe, Simon is wanted for murder.The chapters alternate between events in the present and the events that took place in Georgetown twelve years ago when Hailey was abducted. Readers gain an insight into FBI protocol in regards to missing persons. They will witness the gradual deterioration of Simon's marriage. He and his wife, Tasha, grow farther and farther apart until tragedy strikes them. Everyone, including neighbors, friends, relatives, and teachers, is considered a suspect in Hailey's disappearance. Soon it becomes evident that Simon's worst fears are realized. Hailey has been abducted by a stranger and chances of finding her grow slimmer with each passing moment. Eventually, the media loses interest in her disappearance, the FBI departs, and Simon is left without help."Gone Cold" is a fast-paced, emotionally packed novel about a family that has been torn apart by lust and greed. It centers on the dark secrets that family members can hide from one another for many years. We all yearn to belong to a group, whether it is a family, professional organization, church, etc. After reading "Gone Cold," I contemplated the broken relationships that I have with family members. Now, the reasons for them being broken seem ridiculous and asinine. Hopefully, this novel will encourage readers to seek out broken relationships and try to mend and heal them before it is too late.Douglas Corleone's "Gone Cold" may be the last in the Simon Fisk series, which includes the excellent debut, "Good as Gone," and "Payoff." It's an intriguing cloak-and-dagger series with plenty of gunplay. However, I prefer the more realistic Kevin Corvelli mystery series which is set in beautiful, sun-drenched Hawaii. Even though Corvelli is a morally corrupt lawyer who is also a borderline alcoholic, I think he possesses a certain je ne sais quoi that is quite appealing. "Gone Cold" wrapped up the Simon Fisk series rather nicely. On the other hand, I think Corvelli has many more mysteries to be solved in gorgeous Hawaii. It is the unique setting that initially drew me to that series. Nevertheless, I will be anxiously awaiting Corleone's next mystery.

In Belfast, Ireland, Ciaran Devine was only twelve years old when he was convicted for brutally slaying his foster father, David Rolston. Seven years later, Ciaran is paroled. Detective Chief Inspector Serena Flanagan still believes Ciaran is innocent; his older brother, Thomas, must've coerced him into confessing to Rolston's murder. Supervisors urge her to leave the case alone; both brothers served their time: Ciaran for murder and Thomas for being his accomplice. However, soon after Ciaran's release, anyone who angers Thomas is severely beaten or murdered.Stuart Neville's "Those We Left Behind" is a superb psychological thriller based on sibling abuse. It is the fifth installment in a unique, oftentimes bizarre, series involving the criminal underworld of Belfast, Ireland ("The Ghosts of Belfast," "Collusion," "Lost Souls," "The Final Silence," and "Those We Left Behind"). In Neville's latest novel, Detective Inspector Jack Lennon has been replaced as the protagonist. Serena Flanagan, who was introduced in "The Final Silence," will now be the one whose life is in danger.Serena is a strong, intelligent woman who is very career driven. She is also married with two young children. As though her career and raising a family isn't stressful enough, she is recovering from breast cancer. She has joined a support group. Further complicating her life is a friend, Penny Walker, who informs her that her breast cancer has returned with a vengeance. That very evening, Penny is found dead by suffocation and her husband dead by a self-inflicted gunshot wound. Serena finds this murder-suicide extremely suspicious.From the novel's onset, readers soon learn that Thomas has a perverse hold over his younger brother, Ciaran. At one point, as they lay together on the bed, spooning and caressing, I nearly believed they were lovers, but the novel never depicts that their relationship is ever sexual. Thomas is only two years older than Ciaran. Their age difference is not much. I could understand better if there existed a five years age difference such as the one between my older brother, Fred, and myself. Nevertheless, the relationship between the Devines is an abusive one.Ciaran is helpless without Thomas. He can't do anything without consulting his brother, without first obtaining his approval. He is trapped. Readers will feel much sorrow for Ciaran. I've read many novels where parents and spouses have exercised a dangerous control over other members of their family. This is the first one I've read that dealt with sibling abuse: one child abusing another. Unfortunately, the Devines are orphans, having been shuffled among numerous foster families."Those We Left Behind" is very different from the other novels in the series. It doesn't involve the supernatural, it doesn't have vicious serial killers, and it doesn't involve human trafficking. Neither does it have a high body count. It is not a shoot-'em-up crime drama. It is, however, a very unsettling, very disturbing, very emotional psychological thriller. Beatings, vandalism and an occasional corpse, however, do help maintain a fast pacing. Depending upon their preferences, some readers may think "Those We Left Behind" is the best in the series. Nevertheless, I don't want to be left behind when Stuart Neville's next novel is published.

When my girlfriend, Tammy, moved from her condo into mine, she accidentally left behind a numerous assortment of knives in a drawer beneath where the microwave oven once sat.  When she discovered they were missing, she raced back to the condo to retrieve them but they were already gone.  We assumed the real estate agent stole them because when we questioned her about them she became real nervous and tried to blame it on the movers.  Nothing else was missing but the knives.  Some of those knives were expensive Pampered Chef knives; a few had belonged to Tammys grandmother.  I wanted to give Tammy the 15-Piece Forge Triple Rivet Knife Set from Sabatier to help replace the knives she had lost.  She grew to absolutely love the Sabatier knives.  Several of them, especially the Santoku, reminded her of the Pampered Chef knives she had lost.  Unfortunately, the Sabatier Santoku is two inches shorter than the Pampered Chef one, which is seven inches long.  Because of its hollow grooves (grantons), this knife is very versatile and Tammy has used it to prepare many dishes.  Also, she buys a lot of fresh bread from Panera Bread and has used the Sabatier Serrated Utility Knife to slice the bread herself.  Tammy has already used the Sabatier Paring Knife to peel her apples and pears.  She hates the skin on fruits.  It doesnt bother me, which is probably good since Im horrible at peeling fruit.  Tammy always has to do this for me when preparing pies.  As for me, I use the Sabatier Kitchen Shears quite frequently to open up bags of frozen meals.  One evening I used the Sabatier Chef Knife to slice some chicken breasts to bake in my Pampered Chef Deep Covered Baker; the breasts sliced fairly well.  I call the Chef Knife my Norman Bates Psycho knife.  I like to use it for cutting up various types of meat.  I own a similar set of knives from Chicago Cutlery.  I have had them for two years and the only one that shows signs of rust are the shears.  One blade has a spot of rust that I never could get off no matter how hard I tried.  I know that the knives from such sets as Sabatier and Chicago Cutlery are not to be put into the dishwasher.  The powder detergent will ruin the handles.  Neither are the knives to be left soaking in water for long periods of time.  They are to be washed and towel dried almost immediately after usage.  Unfortunately, I have friends who love to put everything in the dishwasher including thermometers, Teflon coated pans and pots, and their pets food bowls.  I try to hand wash everything that I intend to keep for a long time.  The Acacia block is gorgeous.  It is large and sturdy and safely holds the knives.  The knives themselves seem heavy and durable.  They arrived in good condition.  I inspected them carefully and there were no rust stains.  Tammys parents, Frank and Bev, came over on Friday, September 25th, for her birthday.  They fixed steaks on our outdoor grill.  We ate them using the Sabatier Steak Knives.  I cut up vegetables for the salad using the Sabatier Chef Knife.  Tammy assisted me with the Sabatier Slicing Knife.  Tammy had a wonderful birthday.  (The weather was good compared to what it is now; were preparing for Hurricane Joaquin.)  Overall, the 15-Piece Forge Triple Rivet Knife Set from Sabatier is a great set of knives.  However, they are a little pricey compared to similar brands.  I would still recommend giving them as a gift to the special chef in your life.

I wanted to show my appreciation to my neighbors, Cal and Marlene, who live directly across the street from my condo.  They are nice people who attend my church; they also keep an eye on my home when I am on vacation.  They have carried many an Amazon Vine package across the street to the safety of their home.  They have two little girls:  Jackie is approximately one-and-a-half years old and Susan recently turned three.  Last week, I gave Susan a Dots doll from the Adora My First collection.  I mentioned in an earlier review that I gave Jackie a Baby Stella from Manhattan Toy [Manhattan Toy Baby Stella Peach Soft Nurturing First Baby Doll (new for 2015!)].  Dots reminds me of a Raggedy Ann doll except there is nothing raggedy about her.  Just from closely inspecting her clothes and feeling her face and hands, I can tell she is made of high-quality material.  If taken care of, Dots should last many years.  Susan seems like a quiet, responsible child who takes care of her toys.  Ive never seen her throw temper tantrums and abuse anything.  Cal and Marlene would never allow it.  One day, Susan might be able to give Dots to her daughter.  I still have some of my moms dolls but I never played with them.  For one thing, they were so old-fashioned.  The clothes can be removed and cleaned.  Marlene, who was trying to assist me with my review, told me she washed the dolls clothes before taking Susan to see her grandparents.  She washed them in cold water on delicate cycle and hung them up to air dry.  They washed well.  My biggest worry about washing doll clothes is that they will tear at the seams.  This happened over ten years ago when I was washing clothes that went on the bears in my VanderBear collection.  I had to have a friend repair Corneliuss ripped jacket.  Dot herself shouldnt be put into the washing machine.  It is best to clean her with a damp sponge or washcloth.  Stains can be removed with the Shout Wipe & Go Individual Wipes [Shout Wipe & Go Instant Stain Remover (Pack of 4)].  I use these on my clothes at home and at work and on my carpets, pillows, bed spreads, and other items I dont want to throw into the washer for fear of damaging them.  Just dab a little bit of the product on the stain, let it soak for thirty seconds, and use water to bring it out before air drying.  According to her parents, Susan loves Dot; she plays with her a lot both inside and outside her home.  Cal is a successful GP and has filled Susans playroom with a make-believe kitchen that is better than my real one.  Dot has become a companion of Susan whenever she is cooking in the kitchen or entertaining her sister, Jackie, and other guests at her table and chairs that are made specifically for children her size.  She has numerous plush toys.  (Some of them were manufactured by Dakin and belonged to me when I was a child.)  Jackie loves her animals but she can identify more with Dots.  Even at such a tender age of three, there is a motherly instinct inside her that compels her to love someone else, someone more helpless than herself.  I highly recommend Dots as a birthday or Christmas gift for the special little girl in your life.

Baby Stella from Manhattan Toy is perfect for Jackie who is approximately one-and-a-half years old.  She is the daughter of Cal and Marlene who live in the condo directly across the street from my own.  They attend my church are always gracious enough to check our mail and watch our home when we are gone on vacation.  They are very familiar with the Amazon Vine Program, having lugged numerous cardboard shipping boxes across the street to their residence.  I was thinking of Jackie when I selected Baby Stella from the Amazon Vine Program.  She is the type of baby doll you would want to give to someone you love.  Jackie is a precious tyke.  She loves her Baby Stella.  It is not her first doll but she acts as though it is her first, and only, doll.  Baby Stella is absolutely adorable; she reminds me of the Cabbage Patch kids.  In the earlier eighties, I gave all of my female relatives a Cabbage Patch kid.  Most still have them.  Moms doll sits in a rocking chair, looking nostalgic.  I always enjoyed looking at the Cabbage Patch kids.  I even visited the BabyLand General Hospital in Cleveland, Georgia, where you can see them born.  There are literally hundreds of these cute Cabbage Patch Kids at this unique museum.  Jackie takes her Baby Stella everywhere she goes.  According to Marlene, the clothes have been removed, washed in cold water on delicate cycle, and air dried on clothes hangers.  The doll itself has never been put into the washing machine and shouldnt.  Marlene used a damp sponge on it.  Likewise with the pacifier which has a magnet in it.  The doll seems constructed of high-quality material.  I think Baby Stella from Manhattan Toy is the type of doll that Jackie can cherish for many years, perhaps even passing it down to her own daughter.  I highly recommend it as a birthday or Christmas present.

I have been collecting WWE action figures for several years now and have well over two-hundred in my collection.  I also own numerous play sets including four wrestling rings, a cage, two entrance stages, and a gym.  I take these out of the boxes and display them and allow children that we are babysitting to play with them, provided they are careful.  The figures are very durable.  The play sets aren't, though some benches, chairs, doors, etc., are made to be "breakable."  I was excited when the Amazon Vine Program offered me two figures, Bray Wyatt and John Cena, from the collection of WWE Create a Superstar.  John Cena is dressed like a marine.  I was able to easily put him together.  His limbs and head snap in and out easily.  In fact, without any trouble, I exchanged his torso for that of the more muscular Bray Wyatt.  Earlier, I had noticed that the WWE Create a Superstar John Cena was taller than the other WWE John Cenas in my personal collection.  The helmet fit John Cena's head easily and fit the heads of other WWE figures.  The vest was more difficult to put on.  The back straps are tricky. I had to be very careful.  I am concerned that the straps will break with repeated usage.  It is my suggestion that you find a figure for modeling this vest and keep it on him for as long as possible.  I put the helmet and vest on a John Cena figure that had camouflage pants.  They looked good together.  I might keep it that way.  I also put an American flag in this patriot's hand.  The accessories alone are worth the price of the WWE Create a Superstar figure.  The accessories can be used on numerous WWE figures.  The vest fits well on many of the figures since John Cena is relatively a large wrestler.  His helmet was a different story.  It only fit on those action figures that didn't have much hair.  For example, both the vest and helmet looked good on my Skip Sheffield figure because he is bald and very muscular.  Nevertheless, the WWE Create a Superstar John Cena is a must have for fans of John Cena and collectors, both young and old, of WWE figures.  One can purchase numerous Create a Superstar packs and exchange body parts and accessories, creating a WWE universe that is only limited by ones imagination.

I am an avid collector of WWE figurines.  I have over two-hundred in my personal collection.  They are all out of their boxes.  I have no intention of reselling them.  I let young friends play with them.  Ryan, whom my girlfriend, Tammy, and I often babysit, loves to play with them.  He has been instructed not to be rough with them.  They are, however, difficult to destroy.  The WWE Create a Superstar figures remind me very much of the WWE Elite figures because they are very flexible.  They can do the splits.  The arms, legs and feet of the WWE Create a Superstar figures can easily be removed, but they can easily be reattached.  This is to allow them to be more interchangeable with each other.  I am most fortunate that the Amazon Vine Program has allowed me the opportunity to review two of the WWE Create a Superstar figures.  (I would love to review more.)  I have the Bray Wyatt and the most popular John Cena.  Bray Wyatt has his own brown blacksmith apron and a white phantom mask.  He also came with a sheet of tattoos that are intended only for the figure and his accessories.  I dont like tattoos.  They are hard to apply and remove.  I think they are distracting.  I have no intention of applying them.  However, I kept the sheet in case I change my mind or do decide to give the figure away, which I probably wont.  I was easily able to assemble the Bray Wyatt figure.  Easy-to-read and easy-to-follow directions came in the box.  (They were located on the very bottom of the box; you may not see them at first when you open the package.)  I put the apron and the mask on the figure.  I had to remove Bray Wyatts head in order to put the apron on because he has a big head with so much hair.  The apron snaps closed in the back.  Be careful not to ruin it.  The apron and the mask can be put on other WWE figures that are not associated with the line of WWE Create a Superstar figures.  The apron also looks good on the more masculine figures such as Ryan Mason, Skip Sheffield and Triple H.  The phantom mask gives some figures a creepy, sinister look as if they are a serial killer from a slasher flick.  Famous WWE wrestler Kane has starred in See No Evil and See No Evil 2.  The accessories alone are worth the price of the figure.  They can be expensive when ordering them from online stores that sell wresting figurines and accessories.  (Actually, I havent seen anything similar to the apron or mask sold individually on any site.)  Furthermore, for a different look, I also swapped Bray Wyatts torso with John Cenas torso with no difficulty.  I highly recommend these figures from WWE Create a Superstar as toys for children or action figures for avid collectors.  One can use them to create their very own unique, personalized wrestler.  The combinations are as endless as ones own imagination.

My cousin, Gianna, and her infant daughter, Danielle, live with my girlfriend, Tammy, and I.  Gianna said the TL Care Organic Cotton Mittens were cute and adorable.  She put them on Danielles hands.  Danielle is nearly three months old.  The gloves fit her fine.  They probably would have been loose fitting if she was a newborn.  There are no strings or cords to tighten the mittens around the babys hands.  However, I think Danielle will be able to wear them through the fall and into the winter.  If not, I have a friend, Andrea, at work who will be giving birth to a boy in late December, early January.  Perhaps her child can wear them then.  Two 100% cotton mittens came in a single package and they are extremely soft and comfortable.  Because they are not heavily dyed, Danielle shouldnt have any allergic reactions to them.  The colors are what I call gender friendly; either male or female can wear them.  (Honestly, I wouldnt want my baby son to wear hot pink mittens.)  Earth colors are the best.  Also, Danielle vomited on one of the gloves while Tammy and I were babysitting her.  I quickly washed the mittens on delicate cycle in cold water and hung them up to dry.  They turned out fine, looking nearly as new as when I took them out of their package.  The TL Care Organic Cotton Mittens would make a unique, affordable baby shower gift.

The American Baby Company Organic Fitted Cotton Velour Crib Sheet is a comfortable, cotton-rich sheet that fits the standard size crib sitting in the corner of my office.  Gianna, my niece, along with her entire family, recently moved into my three-story condo.  Her daughter, Danielle, is practically a newborn and sleeps in this crib.  The mocha color of the crib sheet is an attractive earth color and coordinates well with practically any nursery dcor.  The nursery (for right now) just happens to be my office.  Caring for the sheet is easy.  I simply washed it on delicate cycle in cold water, using the most inexpensive liquid detergent that I could find.  (Dont use bleach.)  I dried in in the dryer on low heat.  I would have preferred to hang it on a clothesline like my mom would have done but who uses those these days?  Even after washing it, we had no trouble putting it on the standard size mattress.  It was a tight fit but it is supposed to be tight.  I highly recommend the American Baby Company Organic Fitted Cotton Velour Crib Sheet as a baby shower gift for expectant moms.

The Fisher-Price Froggy Potty is absolutely adorable.  Originally, I had planned to give it to my girlfriends niece, Theresa, who has a baby girl, Claire.  Unfortunately, Theresa and Claire will soon be moving to Galveston, Texas, and Claire is too young for toilet training.  Recently, the married couple next door to me, Kyle and Jeff, told me they were attempting to toilet train their two-year-old adopted son, Aaron.  Their potty is an old metal contraption that looks quite old; they purchased it from a local thrift store.  Tammy, my girlfriend, and I gave Kyle and Jeff the Fisher-Price Froggy Potty.  Aaron was fascinated by it.  He was hesitant about sitting on the old metal contraption, but he was drawn to the Froggy Potty.  In fact, Kyle tells me that Aaron will sit on it while holding his plush giraffe.  Kyle also informed me that the pot is easy to lift out and clean before resetting it.  I highly recommend the Fisher-Price Froggy Potty; it would make a great present for young parents whose children are between the ages of 22 to 30 months and are physically capable of being toilet trained.

I love this Wrangler Mens Authentics Short-Sleeve Classic Woven Shirt.  I wear large T-shirts, polos, henleys, etc., and this short-sleeve shirt fit me perfectly.  It felt as though it was tailor-made for my physique.  I am a 52-year-old, nonathletic Caucasian male who stands barely 5 8 and weighs approximately 180 pounds.  (Im pudgy.)  The shirt is comfortable around my shoulders and arms; there is ample room for me to move them around; I dont feel as though I am in bondage because the shirt is too tight.  Also, the shirt hangs well around my bulging paunch.  The shirt is not fitted for athletically built men.  It is for the everyday guy.  Ive worn it to church and work and received compliments.  My coworker, Eric, laughed and said, Youre dressed like a GS-15.  (A GS-15 is a department supervisor who normally makes over $100,000 a year.)  I usually wear novelty T-shirts such as Hard Rock Caf or Life is Good.  This Wrangler shirt is burgundy, which is my favorite color.  Every car Ive owned has been burgundy.  I have quite a few burgundy shirts.  The Wrangler shirt coordinates well with my dark blue jeans and my black jeans.  I wore it to my church where we dress casually.  It looks great with a black T-shirt underneath it.  I wear it outside my jeans for a more relaxed look.  I wore the shirt right out of the package in which it was shipped.  It didnt need ironing.  Later, after wearing it to church, I washed it in cold water on delicate cycle.  Then I hung it up to dry.  I used a warm iron to get out its few wrinkles.  I didnt experience any difficulties when laundering it.  This Wrangler Mens Authentics Short-Sleeve Classic Woven Shirt would make a great present to any man of any age or race.  Some women may even want to wear it.

The Fisher-Price Snugapuppy is an adorable plush toy that I was tempted to keep myself.  However, I let my girlfriends grandniece, Claire, sleep with it whenever we had to babysit her.  (Alas, that will soon come to an end when Claires parents move to Galveston, Texas, in a few days.)  The on/off switch allows Claire to have a constant companion as she is lying in her crib; she must feel as though someone is gently rocking her.  Claire never likes to be alone.  The soft, gentle lullabies remind me of my own childhood and I experience nostalgic feelings.  I long for the past that is forever gone.  The Snugapuppy will provide Claire with some excellent company as her parents drive her to Texas.

In my home office, I have an old filing cabinet that I rescued from impending destruction.  A close friend of mine, Steve, lost his gift shop and was throwing it away.  He helped me load it in a Ford truck and drive it to my condo.  Steve had emptied it of all its hanging folders which were just lying inside the drawers without frames.  Thankfully, I had received one Smead Heavy-Duty Adjustable Frame for Hanging Folders, Letter Size, from the Amazon Vine Program.  I own a lot of hanging folders for organizing brochures, pamphlets, manuals, warranties, etc., for numerous electronic and kitchen gadgets that I own.  Thanks to the written instructions that came with the frame and the video that is posted on Amazon's website, my girlfriend, Tammy, and I were able to easily put the product together.  It fit snugly inside the top drawer of my filing cabinet.  (In the other drawers, I am keeping notebooks and textbooks that assist me in operating my home business.)  The hanging folders fit nicely inside the frame.  The frame itself is strong and sturdy and doesn't appear to bend precariously with all the folders hanging from it.  It has helped improve my office's organization.  I highly recommend this Smead frame for old filing cabinets that don't already have built-in rails for hanging folders.

Tammy's grandniece, Claire, didn't have a mobile for her crib until we gave her the Wimmer-Ferguson Infant Stim-Mobile from Manhattan Toy.  Tammy easily installed it on the thrift store crib that we have in the corner of my condo's office.  She's the tech savvy one in the family and claimed that it was easy to install.  The ten interchangeable cards are also easy to install and remove.  Claire enjoys lying on her back and gazing at the different shapes.  The one she gazes at the most is the baby that reminds me of the Gerber baby on the jars of baby food.  It is almost as though Claire recognizes another member of her own age group.  I wonder if there are other cards that babies stare at the most.  Does it vary from one baby to another?  These cards look as though they could be found in a psychiatrist's office--a type of Rorschach inkblot card for babies.  I truly believe that this mobile will help a baby's ability to recognize colors and shapes.  The Wimmer-Ferguson Infant Stim-Mobile from Manhattan Toy would make a great gift for an expectant mother, regardless of whether she is having a boy or a girl.  Furthermore, the mobile coordinates well with any nursery dcor.

Recently, my niece, Gianna, and her family moved in with my girlfriend, Tammy, and I.  She has a husband and two children.  The youngest child, Danielle, is still in diapers.  I gave Gianna the Manhattan Toy Travel + Comfort Tactile Bear Play Mat.  The mat arrived already tied with a lovely bow and ready for presenting as a beautiful gift at a baby shower.  The bear and the mat are composed of various materials that are soft.  They won't harm baby Danielle's skin.  Gianna likes to stretch the mat out on my living room floor and place Danielle on it.  Gianna does chores while her baby plays on the mat.  Danielle loves this mat.  She usually lies facedown on it, stretches out her arms and legs, and gurgles happily.  Strangely, however, Danielle often wets her diapers while lying on the bear.  I wonder if this has happened to anyone else's baby/toddler while they were lying happily on an animal- or human-themed play mat.  Danielle loves her Tactile Bear Play Mat.  She seldom wanders off when left there.  Tammy and I are careful to watch her and make sure she doesn't.  The light-blue bear is perfect for little baby boys.  I wish I had received the pink Tactile Deer Play Mat from Manhattan Toy Travel + Comfort (Manhattan Toy Travel + Comfort Tactile Deer Play Mat).  Nevertheless, the Manhattan Toy Travel + Comfort Tactile Bear Play Mat is a wonderful gift for an expecting mother, regardless of whether the baby will be a boy or a girl.

At work, my friend, Janice, who is a young African American, complained several times to me about her hair feeling rough and looking frizzy.  She uses a flatiron to straighten it.  I introduced her to a six-ounce can of Get Sleek Heat Protecting Spray from Tresemme.  It has a nearly non-existent scent and was easy to spray into her towel-dried hair.  She claims it made her hair feel softer and look less frizzy.  I must admit, her black hair does have a smoother appearance.  I highly recommend this Tresemme product for anyone who uses a flatiron.

Indeed, the Now Designs Homespun Dishcloths are attractive dishcloths that have an old-fashioned, nostalgic appearance.  They remind me of the ones my grandmother once crocheted and were hanging in her kitchen.  Hers however, were solid white except for thin stripes of pink and blue.  She also crocheted me sweaters.  My mom bought me a kit for crocheting potholders that is very similar to the Made by Me Weaving Loom (Made by Me Weaving Loom).  I made her dozens of potholders that remind me of these dishcloths.  The Now Designs Homespun Dishcloths are 100% cotton.  They feel great in my hands.  Upon receiving them, I immediately tossed them into the washing machine, ran the cold water, and washed them on delicate cycle.  Afterwards, I then hung them up to dry in my bathroom.  In other words, I treated them as if they were one of my crocheted sweaters, except I lay my sweaters flat on my couch in order to dry them with a minimal amount of stretching and wrinkling.  The Now Designs Homespun Dishcloths cleaned my Teflon-coated skillet without scratching it.  There were dishcloths in a set.  I used one for washing and one for drying.  They both performed well.  My only concern is their longevity.  My crocheted sweaters are easily picked; I must be careful with them.  The dishcloths arrived already picked in several places.  These washcloths look nice but are not as durable as others I own.  However, if you are searching for dishcloths that are appropriate for a nostalgic kitchen, then the Now Designs Homespun Dishcloths would be perfect.

My girlfriend, Tammy, loves these panties from Fruit of the Loom.  This is her first set of boyshorts.  She's always wanted to try wearing them.  Tammy found them very comfortable; they are a good fit.  She also likes the colors.  They are earth colors: black, brown, white and rose.  She swears she would never wear hot pink.  Tammy, like me, was surprised that a fabric that is extremely high in polyester could be so comfortable.  It is a new type of technology that Fruit of the Loom has employed.  My black polo shirt from Wrangler (Wrangler Men's Authentics Short Sleeve Performance Polo) is made of a breathable 100% polyester that I have found to be very comfortable and easy to care.  Tammy washed the panties in cold water on hand-wash cycle.  She hung them up in the bathroom and they quickly air dried .  She likes these Fruit of the Loom boyshorts so much that she would love to have more of them.  I'll buy her some for Christmas which is right around the corner.  Amazon, I believe, is selling them at a very reasonable price.

I have suffered with Irritable Bowel Syndrome with Constipation (IBS-C) since I was a teenager.  It is a neurological disorder that is aggravated by stress.  Certain fibrous foods, such as pineapple, help move your bowels.  Junk food contributes to constipation.  I try to consume more fruits and vegetables and foods that are high in probiotics, such as Dannon Activia yogurt.  Probiotics are essential in maintaining healthy digestion and preventing constipation.  I eat Dannon Activia yogurt every day.  However, I have found that a dietary supplement of probiotics in the form of a pill, capsule, tablet, gummi, etc., is also essential.  Recently, I've been introduced to Probiotic 10 from Vitamin World.  I live in Chesapeake, Virginia, and the nearest Vitamin World is in Hampton, about 25 miles away.  I trust Vitamin World; I have bought many products from them.  There is a Vitamin World at Foothills Mall in Maryville, Tennessee, where my parents live.  When I travel to Maryville during the holidays, I always shop there.  Probiotic 10 has ten varieties of probiotics.  The recommended dosage is two capsules; however, I only take one because I am already consuming probiotics in the form of yogurt.  (I eat two servings).  If I consume more probiotics, I might get diarrhea.  The tinted glass jar of Probiotic 10 was easy to open.  It had a protective seal.  The gelatinous capsules are medium in size and easy to swallow; they have no taste or smell.  It is recommended that they are consumed with food but I take only one before bedtime.  The expiration date is 10/16; it is printed on the side of the bottle itself and on the bottom of the cardboard box in which it was packaged.  There are 120 capsules.  This is a four-month supply for me since I will be taking only one per day.  I highly recommend taking daily probiotics and Probiotic 10 will ensure you get the proper ones.  I also recommend starting out with one per day and seeing if that will be a sufficient dosage.

I love the black six-foot AmazonBasics Apple Certified Lightning to USB Cable.  I download a lot of photographs and videos to my iPhone 5S and then quickly transfer them to a SeaGate GoFlex external hard drive that is always connected to my desktop PC.  In the past, I connected a Belkin four-inch Lightning to USB Cable from my iPhone to my PC.  Consequently, the dangling iPhone barely touched the carpet in my office.  Furthermore, it was nearly impossible to perform any functions, other than touch the Trust button, on my iPhone when it was in this awkward position.  My six-foot cable from AmazonBasics makes life much easier.  I can keep my iPhone connected to my PC and perform various types of functions, such as conversing with friends and family, while data is being transferred from its memory into my external hard drive.  Also, I havent noticed data taking any longer to transfer despite the cables increased length.  My girlfriend, Tammy, calls me The Cable Guy because I own numerous cables of various lengths, colors and functions.  You can never have too many cables for connecting, charging and syncing all your electronics.  I must admit, one of my favorite is the black six-foot AmazonBasics Lightning to USB Cable.

To be honest, I am not a big fan of tomatoes, unless they are cherry tomatoes.  I have never had a Bloody Mary until today.  In the past, I looked at a recipe for one and thought it was too complex to make.  I'm good at making Strawberry Daiquiris, provided that I have a mix.  Well, when the Amazon Vine Program offered me the Mr & Mrs T Original Bloody Mary Mix I jumped on it.  I received a four pack of 5.5 ounce cans.  The cans were much smaller than I had anticipated.  They are definitely single serving cans.  Each can only has 35 calories.  This is good since I'm on a diet; this morning, I could barely squeeze into my jean shorts.  When making the Bloody Mary, I followed directions to a T; they are labeled on the back of the can.  I took a tall hurricane glass and dumped one cup of ice (approximately 8 cubes) inside, then I measured and poured 1 ounce of Absolut vodka, and then I shook the can of Mr & Mrs T and poured it inside.  I washed and added a celery stalk and used it to stir the concoction.  The Bloody Mary was very delicious.  I love it.  It is rich with tomatoes and has a multitude of spices.  I enjoyed sipping it while reading a novel.  The vodka has put me in a great mood this Saturday morning.  I feel like dancing.  I am prepared for anything.  I am about to go to choir practice at my church down the street; we are starting to rehearse for our Christmas musical.  (Christmas will be here before you know it.)  The choir director will be wondering why I'm so happy.  I plan to order more of the Mr & Mrs T Original Bloody Mary Mix from Amazon.  It may be what I need to get me through the stressful holidays.

Tammy, my girlfriend, has two adorable cats, Riley and Jessie.  They aren't finicky; they will east most anything.  I wasn't surprised when they devoured the CORE Natural Grain Free Dry Cat Food, Turkey & Duck Recipe.  The Amazon Vine Program kindly sent us a two-pound bag for review.  It was easy to cut open and reseal.  When feeding the cats, we carefully followed the directions provided on the Amazon website.  The CORE cat food is very high in protein.  Most of our friends at church are cat lovers who are constantly posting photos of their beloved felines on FaceBook; they adamantly warned us that Riley and Jessie might vomit if we didn't slowly make a transition from their regular cat food to a cat food that had mostly protein.  Fortunately, the transition was easy and smooth.  The cats never became ill.  First, we printed the page from the website that depicted mixing 75% old cat food and 25% new cat food on the first and second days, 50% old cat food and 50% new cat food on the third and fourth days, etc.  We posted the page on the refrigerator and used an ink pen to mark off the days.  On the seventh day, the cats were eating 100% new food.  We plan to order more of the CORE Grain Free Dry Cat from Amazon.

Recently, my two roommates, and two of my best friends, Bill and Sue, vacated my condo.  (They are retiring to Miami.)  Now, I'm scrambling for new roommates.  I used the Bissell 1548 ProHeat 2X Revolution Pet Full-Size Carpet Cleaner to renew the beige carpet in their bedroom.  It did such a wonderful job of refreshing their carpet that I vacuumed the entire condo.  Initially, I was expecting the Bissell 1548 to be a versatile vacuum that I could use dry or wet.  It is solely a wet vacuum cleaner.  First, I had to use my Hoover WindTunnel 2 Rewind Pet Bagless Upright Vacuum, UH70831PC (Hoover WindTunnel 2 Rewind Pet Bagless Upright Vacuum, UH70831PC), to vacuum the carpet before using the Bissell 1548.  There are two cleaning modes: Deep Clean Mode and Express Clean Mode.  There are also a variety of Bissell formulas to use.  Bottles of Deep Clean + Antibacterial Formula and Professional Deep Cleaning Formula were included with the vacuum.  My girlfriend, Tammy, and I chose the Deep Clean Mode because our carpet hadn't been steam cleaned since I moved into my condominium over two years ago.  We also chose the Deep Clean + Antibacterial Formula because of Tammy's two cats, Riley and Jessie, that are supposed to be confined to the third floor; however, they roam throughout the building, spreading hair and bacterial everywhere.  The Bissell 1548 has two water tanks.  There is the Clean Water Tank and The Dirty Water Tank.  The Clean Water Tank reminded me of the tank on my Bissell Powerfresh Steam Mop [BISSELL Powerfresh Steam Mop, Blue, 1940A (Same as 1940)].  The tank is easy to remove and fill with HOT tap water.  It isn't necessary to use distilled water.  The Bissell cleaning formula will be added to this tank.  Simply follow the directions on the bottle to determine the amount of water and formula to add into the tank.  There is a simple switch for selecting Deep Cleaning or Express Cleaning.
